“ Hurry up , [[you]1127-they two]3050-you two , or there wo n’t be any food left , ”[242-mrs. weasley] [Mrs. Weasley]242-mrs. weasley called .

[Sirius]174-sirius heaved another great sigh , cast a dark look at the tapestry , and [he]174-sirius and [Harry]156-harry went to join [the others]615-the others .

[Harry]156-harry tried [his]156-harry best not to think about the hearing while [they]1127-they emptied the glass cabinets that afternoon . Fortunately for [him]156-harry , it was a job that required a lot of concentration , as many of the objects in [there]796-there seemed very reluctant to leave [their]1127-they dusty shelves . [Sirius]174-sirius sustained a bad bite from a silver snuffbox ; within seconds , [his]174-sirius bitten hand had developed an unpleasant crusty covering like a tough brown glove .

“ It ’s okay , ”[156-harry] [he]156-harry said , examining the hand with interest before tapping it lightly with [his]156-harry wand and restoring its skin to normal , “ must be Wartcap powder in there . ”[156-harry]

[He]156-harry threw the box aside into the sack where [they]1127-they were depositing the debris from the cabinets ; [Harry]156-harry saw [George]245-george wrap [his]156-harry own hand carefully in a cloth moments later and sneak the box into [his]156-harry already doxy - filled pocket .

[They]1127-they found an unpleasant - looking silver instrument , something like a many - legged pair of tweezers , which scuttled up [Harry]156-harry ’s arm like a spider when [he]156-harry picked it up , and attempted to puncture [his]156-harry skin ; [Sirius]174-sirius seized it and smashed it with a heavy book entitled Nature ’s Nobility : A Wizarding Genealogy . There was a musical box that emitted a faintly sinister , tinkling tune when wound , and [they]1127-they all found [themselves]1127-they becoming curiously weak and sleepy until [Ginny]247-ginny had the sense to slam the lid shut ; also a heavy locket that none of [them]1127-they could open , a number of ancient seals and , in a dusty box , an Order of [Merlin]305-merlin , First Class , that had been awarded to [[Sirius]174-sirius ’s grandfather]1129-sirius ’s grandfather for “ Services to [the Ministry]2855-the ministry . ”[247-ginny]

“ It means [he]1129-sirius ’s grandfather gave [them]1127-they a load of gold , ”[174-sirius] said [Sirius]174-sirius contemptuously , throwing the medal into the rubbish sack .

Several times , [Kreacher]259-kreacher sidled into [the room]707-the room and attempted to smuggle things away under [his]259-kreacher loincloth , muttering horrible curses every time [they]1127-they caught [him]259-kreacher at it . When [Sirius]174-sirius wrested a large golden ring bearing the Black crest from [his]259-kreacher grip [Kreacher]259-kreacher actually burst into furious tears and left [the room]707-the room sobbing under [his]259-kreacher breath and calling [Sirius]174-sirius names [Harry]156-harry had never heard before .

“ It was [[my]174-sirius father]3453-my father ’s , ”[174-sirius] said [Sirius]174-sirius , throwing the ring into the sack . “ [Kreacher]259-kreacher was n’t quite as devoted to [him]3453-my father as to [[my]174-sirius mother]3157-my mother , but [I]174-sirius still caught [him]259-kreacher snogging a pair of [[my]174-sirius father]3453-my father ’s old trousers last week . ”[174-sirius]

[Mrs. Weasley]242-mrs. weasley kept [them]1132-they all working very hard over the next few days . [The drawing room]3075-the drawing room took three days to decontaminate ; finally the only undesirable things left in [it]3075-the drawing room were the tapestry of the Black family tree , which resisted all [their]1132-they attempts to remove it from the wall , and the rattling writing desk ; [Moody]218-moody had not dropped by [headquarters]2989-headquarters yet , so [they]1132-they could not be sure what was inside it .

[They]1132-they moved from [the drawing room]3075-the drawing room to [a dining room on the ground floor]1136-a dining room on the ground floor where [they]1132-they found spiders large as saucers lurking in the dresser ( [Ron]333-ron left [the room]707-the room hurriedly to make a cup of tea and did not return for an hour and a half ) . The china , which bore the Black crest and motto , was all thrown unceremoniously into a sack by [Sirius]174-sirius , and the same fate met a set of old photographs in tarnished silver frames , [all of whose occupants]1138-all of whose occupants squealed shrilly as the glass covering [them]1138-all of whose occupants smashed .

[Snape]249-snape might refer to [their]1132-they work as “ cleaning , ”[249-snape] but in [Harry]156-harry ’s opinion [they]1132-they were really waging war on [the house]2870-the house , which was putting up a very good fight , aided and abetted by [Kreacher]259-kreacher . [The house - elf]1103-the house - elf kept appearing wherever [they]1132-they were congregated , [his]1103-the house - elf muttering becoming more and more offensive as [he]1103-the house - elf attempted to remove anything [he]1103-the house - elf could from the rubbish sacks . [Sirius]174-sirius went as far as to threaten [him]174-sirius with clothes , but [Kreacher]259-kreacher fixed [him]174-sirius with a watery stare and said , “ [Master]3469-master must do as [Master]3470-master wishes , ”[259-kreacher] before turning away and muttering very loudly , “ but [Master]3471-master will not turn [Kreacher]259-kreacher away , no , because [Kreacher]259-kreacher knows what [they]1132-they are up to , oh yes , [he]259-kreacher is plotting against [the Dark Lord]287-the dark lord , yes , with [these Mudbloods]3472-these mudbloods and [traitors and scum]3473-traitors and scum ... ”[259-kreacher]

At which [Sirius]174-sirius , ignoring [Hermione]172-hermione ’s protests , seized [Kreacher]259-kreacher by the back of [his]259-kreacher loincloth and threw [him]259-kreacher bodily from [the room]707-the room .

The doorbell rang several times a day , which was the cue for [[Sirius]174-sirius ’s mother]1142-sirius ’s mother to start shrieking again , and for [Harry]156-harry and [the others]615-the others to attempt to eavesdrop on [the visitor]1144-the visitor , though [they]1145-they gleaned very little from the brief glimpses and snatches of conversation [they]1145-they were able to sneak before [Mrs. Weasley]242-mrs. weasley recalled [them]1145-they to [their]1145-they tasks . [Snape]249-snape flitted in and out of [the house]2870-the house several times more , though to [Harry]156-harry ’s relief [they]1145-they never came face - to - face ; [he]156-harry also caught sight of [[his]156-harry Transfiguration teacher]1147-his transfiguration teacher , [Professor McGonagall]306-professor mcgonagall , looking very odd in a Muggle dress and coat , though [she]1147-his transfiguration teacher also seemed too busy to linger .

Sometimes , however , [the visitors]1148-the visitors stayed to help ; [Tonks]225-tonks joined [them]1148-the visitors for a memorable afternoon in which [they]1148-the visitors found a murderous old ghoul lurking in an [upstairs toilet]1149-upstairs toilet , and [Lupin]221-lupin , who was staying in [the house]2870-the house with [Sirius]174-sirius but who left [it]2870-the house for long periods to do mysterious work for [the Order]3062-the order , helped [them]1148-the visitors repair a grandfather clock that had developed the unpleasant habit of shooting heavy bolts at [passersby]520-passersby . [Mundungus]190-mundungus redeemed [himself]190-mundungus slightly in [Mrs. Weasley]242-mrs. weasley ’s eyes by rescuing [Ron]333-ron from an ancient set of purple robes that had tried to strangle [him]156-harry when [he]156-harry removed them from [their]1148-the visitors wardrobe .

Despite the fact that [he]156-harry was still sleeping badly , still having dreams about [corridors]1153-corridors and locked doors that made [his]156-harry scar prickle , [Harry]156-harry was managing to have fun for the first time all summer . As long as [he]156-harry was busy [he]156-harry was happy ; when the action abated , however , whenever [he]156-harry dropped [his]156-harry guard , or lay exhausted in bed watching blurred shadows move across the ceiling , the thought of the looming Ministry hearing returned to [him]156-harry . Fear jabbed at [his]156-harry insides like needles as [he]156-harry wondered what was going to happen to [him]156-harry if [he]156-harry was expelled . The idea was so terrible that [he]156-harry did not dare voice it aloud , not even to [Ron]333-ron and [Hermione]172-hermione , who , though [he]156-harry often saw [them]1148-the visitors whispering together and casting anxious looks in [his]156-harry direction , followed [his]156-harry lead in not mentioning it . Sometimes [he]156-harry could not prevent [his]156-harry imagination showing [him]156-harry [a faceless Ministry official who was snapping [his]156-harry wand in two and ordering [him]156-harry back to [the Dursleys]161-the dursleys ’ ...]1154-a faceless ministry official who was snapping his wand in two and ordering him back to the dursleys ’ ... but [he]156-harry would not go . [He]156-harry was determined on that . [He]156-harry would come back here to [Grimmauld Place]34-grimmauld place and live with [Sirius]174-sirius .

[He]156-harry felt as though a brick had dropped into [his]156-harry stomach when [Mrs. Weasley]242-mrs. weasley turned to [him]156-harry during dinner on Wednesday evening and said quietly , “ [I]242-mrs. weasley ’ve ironed [your]156-harry best clothes for tomorrow morning , [Harry]156-harry , and [I]242-mrs. weasley want [you]156-harry to wash [your]156-harry hair tonight too . A good first impression can work wonders . ”[242-mrs. weasley]

[Ron]333-ron , [Hermione]172-hermione , [Fred]244-fred , [George]245-george , and [Ginny]247-ginny all stopped talking and looked over at [him]156-harry . [Harry]156-harry nodded and tried to keep eating [his]156-harry chops , but [his]156-harry mouth had become so dry [he]156-harry could not chew .

“ How am [I]156-harry getting there ? ”[156-harry] [he]156-harry asked [Mrs. Weasley]242-mrs. weasley , trying to sound unconcerned .

“ [Arthur]205-arthur ’s taking [you]156-harry to work with [him]205-arthur , ”[242-mrs. weasley] said [Mrs. Weasley]242-mrs. weasley gently .

[Mr. Weasley]199-mr. weasley smiled encouragingly at [Harry]156-harry across the table .

“ [You]156-harry can wait in [[my]199-mr. weasley office]3474-my office until it ’s time for the hearing , ”[199-mr. weasley] [he]199-mr. weasley said .

[Harry]156-harry looked over at [Sirius]174-sirius , but before [he]156-harry could ask the question , [Mrs. Weasley]242-mrs. weasley had answered it .

“ [Professor Dumbledore]176-dumbledore does n’t think it ’s a good idea for [Sirius]174-sirius to go with [you]156-harry , and [I]242-mrs. weasley must say [I]242-mrs. weasley — ”[242-mrs. weasley]

“ — think [he]176-dumbledore ’s quite right , ”[174-sirius] said [Sirius]174-sirius through clenched teeth .

[Mrs. Weasley]242-mrs. weasley pursed [her]242-mrs. weasley lips .

“ When did [Dumbledore]176-dumbledore tell [you]242-mrs. weasley that ? ”[156-harry] [Harry]156-harry said , staring at [Sirius]174-sirius .

“ [He]176-dumbledore came last night , when [you]156-harry were in bed , ”[199-mr. weasley] said [Mr. Weasley]199-mr. weasley .

[Sirius]174-sirius stabbed moodily at a potato with [his]174-sirius fork . [Harry]156-harry dropped [his]156-harry own eyes to [his]156-harry plate . The thought that [Dumbledore]176-dumbledore had been in [the house]2870-the house on the eve of [his]176-dumbledore hearing and not asked to see [him]176-dumbledore made [him]156-harry feel , if that were possible , even worse .

[Harry]156-harry awoke at half - past five the next morning as abruptly and completely as if [somebody]724-somebody had yelled in [his]156-harry ear . For a few moments [he]156-harry lay immobile as the prospect of the hearing filled every tiny particle of [his]156-harry brain , then , unable to bear it , [he]156-harry leapt out of bed and put on [his]156-harry glasses . [Mrs. Weasley]242-mrs. weasley had laid out [his]156-harry freshly laundered jeans and T - shirt at the foot of [his]156-harry bed . [Harry]156-harry scrambled into them . The blank picture on the wall sniggered again .

[Ron]333-ron was lying sprawled on [his]333-ron back with [his]333-ron mouth wide open , fast asleep . [He]333-ron did not stir as [Harry]156-harry crossed [the room]707-the room , stepped out onto [the landing]945-the landing , and closed the door softly behind [him]156-harry . Trying not to think of the next time [he]156-harry would see [Ron]333-ron , when [they]1159-they might no longer be [fellow students at [Hogwarts]13-hogwarts]1160-fellow students at hogwarts , [Harry]156-harry walked quietly down [the stairs]801-the stairs , past the heads of [[Kreacher]259-kreacher ’s ancestors]1162-kreacher ’s ancestors , and into [the kitchen]694-the kitchen .

[He]156-harry had expected [it]694-the kitchen to be empty , but it was not . When [he]156-harry reached the door [he]156-harry heard the soft rumble of voices on the other side and when [he]156-harry pushed it open [he]156-harry saw [Mr.]1164-mr. and [Mrs. Weasley]242-mrs. weasley , [Sirius]174-sirius , [Lupin]221-lupin , and [Tonks]225-tonks sitting there almost as though [they]1165-they were waiting for [him]156-harry . [All]1166-all were fully dressed except [Mrs. Weasley]242-mrs. weasley , who was wearing a quilted , purple dressing gown . [She]242-mrs. weasley leapt to [her]242-mrs. weasley feet the moment [he]156-harry entered .

“ Breakfast , ”[242-mrs. weasley] [she]242-mrs. weasley said as [she]242-mrs. weasley pulled out [her]242-mrs. weasley wand and hurried over to the fire .

“ M - m - morning , [Harry]156-harry , ”[225-tonks] yawned [Tonks]225-tonks . [Her]242-mrs. weasley hair was blonde and curly this morning . “ Sleep all right ? ”[242-mrs. weasley]

“ Yeah , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry .

“ [I]242-mrs. weasley ’ve b - b - been up all night , ”[242-mrs. weasley] [she]242-mrs. weasley said , with another shuddering yawn . “ Come and sit down ... ”[242-mrs. weasley]

[She]242-mrs. weasley drew out a chair , knocking over the one beside it in the process .

“ What do [you]156-harry want , [Harry]156-harry ? ”[242-mrs. weasley] [Mrs. Weasley]242-mrs. weasley called . “ Porridge ? Muffins ? Kippers ? Bacon and eggs ? Toast ? ”[242-mrs. weasley]

“ Just — just toast , thanks , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry .

[Lupin]221-lupin glanced at [Harry]156-harry , then said to [Tonks]225-tonks , “ What were [you]156-harry saying about [Scrimgeour]307-scrimgeour ? ”[221-lupin]

“ Oh ... yeah ... well , [we]3475-we need to be a bit more careful , [he]307-scrimgeour ’s been asking [Kingsley]226-kingsley and [me]242-mrs. weasley funny questions ... ”[242-mrs. weasley]

[Harry]156-harry felt vaguely grateful that [he]156-harry was not required to join in the conversation . [His]156-harry insides were squirming . [Mrs. Weasley]242-mrs. weasley placed a couple of pieces of toast and marmalade in front of [him]156-harry ; [he]156-harry tried to eat , but it was like chewing carpet . [Mrs. Weasley]242-mrs. weasley sat down on [his]156-harry other side and started fussing with [his]156-harry T - shirt , tucking in the label and smoothing out creases across the shoulders . [He]156-harry wished [she]242-mrs. weasley would n’t .

“ ... and [I]225-tonks ’ll have to tell [Dumbledore]176-dumbledore [I]225-tonks ca n’t do night duty tomorrow , [I]225-tonks ’m just t - t - too tired , ”[225-tonks] [Tonks]225-tonks finished , yawning hugely again .

“ [I]199-mr. weasley ’ll cover for [you]156-harry , ”[199-mr. weasley] said [Mr. Weasley]199-mr. weasley . “ [I]199-mr. weasley ’m okay , [I]199-mr. weasley ’ve got a report to finish anyway ... ”[199-mr. weasley]

[Mr. Weasley]199-mr. weasley was not wearing [wizard]2936-wizard ’s robes but a pair of pin - striped trousers and an old bomber jacket . [He]199-mr. weasley turned from [Tonks]225-tonks to [Harry]156-harry .

“ How are [you]156-harry feeling ? ”[199-mr. weasley]

[Harry]156-harry shrugged .

“ It ’ll all be over soon , ”[199-mr. weasley] [Mr. Weasley]199-mr. weasley said bracingly . “ In a few hours ’ time [you]156-harry ’ll be cleared . ”[199-mr. weasley]

[Harry]156-harry said nothing .

“ Yeah , it looks like [our]1465-we law - breaking days are finally over , ”[245-george] said [George]245-george , shaking [his]244-fred head .

“ Those two ! ”[172-hermione] said [Hermione]172-hermione furiously , staring up at the ceiling , through which [they]944-the twins could now hear [Fred]244-fred and [George]245-george roaring with laughter in [the room]707-the room [upstairs]3038-upstairs . “ Do n’t pay any attention to [them]3734-these two , [Ron]333-ron , [they]3734-these two ’re only jealous ! ”[245-george]

“ [I]333-ron do n’t think [they]3734-these two are , ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron doubtfully , also looking up at the ceiling . “ [They]3734-these two ’ve always said only prats become [prefects]3735-prefects ... [He]333-ron dashed from [the room]707-the room , leaving [Harry]156-harry and [Hermione]172-hermione alone .

For some reason , [Harry]156-harry found that [he]156-harry did not want to look at [Hermione]172-hermione . [He]156-harry turned to [his]156-harry bed , picked up the pile of clean robes [Mrs. Weasley]242-mrs. weasley had laid upon it , and crossed [the room]707-the room to [his]156-harry trunk .

“ [Harry]156-harry ? ”[172-hermione] said [Hermione]172-hermione tentatively .

[He]156-harry leaned over [his]156-harry trunk , laid the robes on the bottom of it , and pretended to be rummaging for something while [Hermione]172-hermione crossed to the wardrobe and called [Hedwig]213-hedwig down . [He]156-harry straightened up and looked behind [him]156-harry . [Hermione]172-hermione and [Hedwig]213-hedwig had gone . [Harry]156-harry returned slowly to [his]156-harry bed and sank onto it , gazing unseeingly at the foot of [the wardrobe]938-the wardrobe .

[He]156-harry had forgotten completely about [prefects]3735-prefects being chosen in the fifth year . [He]156-harry had been too anxious about the possibility of being expelled to spare a thought for the fact that [badges]1473-badges must be winging [their]1473-badges way toward [certain people]1474-certain people . But if [he]156-harry had remembered ... if [he]156-harry had thought about it ... what would [he]156-harry have expected ?

Not this , said a small and truthful voice inside [his]156-harry head .

[Harry]156-harry screwed up [his]156-harry face and buried it in [his]156-harry hands . [He]156-harry could not lie to [himself]156-harry ; if [he]156-harry had known the prefect badge was on its way , [he]156-harry would have expected it to come to [him]156-harry , not [Ron]333-ron . Did this make [him]156-harry as arrogant as [Draco Malfoy]298-malfoy ? Did [he]156-harry think [himself]156-harry superior to [everyone else]963-everyone else ? Did [he]156-harry really believe [he]156-harry was better than [Ron]333-ron ?

No , said [the small voice]1476-the small voice defiantly .

Was that true ? [Harry]156-harry wondered , anxiously probing [his]156-harry own feelings .

[I]0-i ’m better at [Quidditch]329-gryffindor , said [the voice]1477-the voice . But [I]0-i ’m not better at anything else .

That was definitely true , [Harry]156-harry thought ; [he]156-harry was no better than [Ron]333-ron in lessons . But what about outside lessons ? [Mad - Eye Moody]218-moody was sniffing at a chicken leg with what remained of [his]218-moody nose ; evidently [he]218-moody could not detect any trace of poison , because [he]218-moody then tore a strip off it with [his]218-moody teeth .

[She]242-mrs. weasley left [the kitchen]694-the kitchen . [Harry]156-harry set down [his]156-harry plate and wondered whether [he]156-harry could follow [her]242-mrs. weasley without attracting attention .

“ [You]156-harry all right , [Potter]156-harry ? ”[218-moody] grunted [Moody]218-moody .

“ Yeah , fine , ”[156-harry] lied [Harry]156-harry .

[An old woman]1573-an old woman greeted [them]1571-them on the corner . [She]1573-an old woman had tightly curled gray hair and wore a purple hat shaped like a porkpie .

“ [Wotcher]352-wotcher , [Harry]156-harry , ”[1573-an old woman] [she]1573-an old woman said , winking . “ Better hurry up , had n’t [we]1571-them , [Molly]266-molly ? ”[1573-an old woman] [she]1573-an old woman added , checking [her]1573-an old woman watch .

“ [I]242-mrs. weasley know , [I]242-mrs. weasley know , ”[242-mrs. weasley] moaned [Mrs. Weasley]242-mrs. weasley , lengthening [her]242-mrs. weasley stride , “ but [Mad - Eye]218-moody wanted to wait for [Sturgis]230-sturgis podmore ... But the great black dog gave a joyful bark and gamboled around [them]1574-them , snapping at pigeons , and chasing its own tail . [Harry]156-harry could n’t help laughing . “ Yeah , right , because [Malfoy]298-malfoy wo n’t abuse it at all , ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron sarcastically .

“ No , [I]333-ron ’m just going to make sure [I]333-ron get [[his]369-goyle mates]3830-his mates before [he]369-goyle gets [mine]333-ron . ”[333-ron]

“ For heaven ’s sake , [Ron]333-ron — ”[333-ron]

“ [I]333-ron ’ll make [Goyle]369-goyle do lines , it ’ll kill [him]369-goyle , [he]369-goyle hates writing , ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron happily . [He]333-ron lowered [his]333-ron voice to [Goyle]369-goyle ’s low grunt and , screwing up [his]333-ron face in a look of pained concentration , mimed writing in midair . “ [I]333-ron ... must ... not ... look ... like ... [a ... baboon]3831-a ... baboon ’s ... backside ... ”[333-ron]

[Everyone]779-everyone laughed , but [nobody]526-nobody laughed harder than [Luna Lovegood]356-luna . [She]356-luna let out a scream of mirth that caused [Hedwig]213-hedwig to wake up and flap [her]356-luna wings indignantly and [Crookshanks]258-crookshanks to leap up into the luggage rack , hissing . [She]356-luna laughed so hard that [her]356-luna magazine slipped out of [her]356-luna grasp , slid down [her]356-luna legs , and onto the floor .

“ That was funny ! ”[356-luna]

[Her]356-luna prominent eyes swam with tears as [she]356-luna gasped for breath , staring at [Ron]333-ron . “ Are [you]356-luna taking the mickey ? ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron , frowning at [her]356-luna .

“ [Baboon]370-baboon ’s ... backside ! ”[356-luna] [she]356-luna choked , holding [her]356-luna ribs .

[Everyone else]963-everyone else was watching [Luna]356-luna laughing , but [Harry]156-harry , glancing at the magazine on the floor , noticed something that made [him]156-harry dive for it . Upside down it had been hard to tell what the picture on the front was , but [Harry]156-harry now realized it was a fairly bad cartoon of [Cornelius Fudge]256-fudge ; [Harry]156-harry only recognized [him]256-fudge because of the lime - green bowler hat . Beneath this were listed the titles of other articles inside the magazine .

[He]156-harry found the page and turned excitedly to the article .

[Harry]156-harry had to read this sentence several times before [he]156-harry was convinced that [he]156-harry had not misunderstood it . Since when had [Sirius]174-sirius been a singing sensation ?

[Harry]156-harry finished reading and stared at the page in disbelief . Perhaps it was a joke , [he]156-harry thought , perhaps the magazine often printed spoof items . [He]156-harry flicked back a few pages and found the piece on [Fudge]256-fudge .

[Cornelius Fudge]256-fudge , [the Minister of Magic]1338-the minister of magic , denied that [he]256-fudge had any plans to take over the running of [the Wizarding bank]1640-the wizarding bank , [Gringotts]47-gringotts , when [he]256-fudge was elected [Minister of Magic]3241-minister of magic five years ago . “ It would n’t be the first time , either , ”[1646-a ministry insider] said [a Ministry insider]1646-a ministry insider . “ [Cornelius ‘ Goblin - Crusher ’ Fudge]256-fudge , that ’s what [[his]256-fudge friends]602-his friends call [him]256-fudge , if [you]3833-you could hear [him]256-fudge when [he]256-fudge thinks [no one]775-no one ’s listening , oh , [he]256-fudge ’s always talking about the goblins [he]256-fudge ’s had done in ; [he]256-fudge ’s had [them]3835-them drowned , [he]256-fudge ’s had them dropped off [buildings]3836-buildings , [he]256-fudge ’s had [them]3835-them poisoned , [he]256-fudge ’s had them cooked in pies ... ”[1646-a ministry insider]

[Harry]156-harry could not understand why [the coaches]1684-the coaches were being pulled by these horrible horses when [they]1681-the hundred or so horseless stagecoaches that always took the students above first year up to the castle were quite capable of moving along by [themselves]1681-the hundred or so horseless stagecoaches that always took the students above first year up to the castle .

[Harry]156-harry felt utterly bewildered . Smiling faintly , [she]356-luna climbed into [the musty interior of [the carriage]1626-the carriage]1699-the musty interior of the carriage after [Ron]333-ron . Not altogether reassured , [Harry]156-harry followed [her]356-luna .

[Harry]156-harry did not want to tell [the others]615-the others that [he]156-harry and [Luna]356-luna were having the same hallucination , if that was what it was , so [he]156-harry said nothing about the horses as [he]156-harry sat down inside [the carriage]1626-the carriage and slammed the door behind [him]156-harry . Nevertheless , [he]156-harry could not help watching the silhouettes of the horses moving beyond the window .

“ Did [everyone]779-everyone see [that Grubbly - Plank woman]3855-that grubbly - plank woman ? ”[247-ginny] asked [Ginny]247-ginny . “ What ’s [she]3855-that grubbly - plank woman doing back here ? [Hagrid]281-hagrid ca n’t have left , can [he]281-hagrid ? ”[247-ginny]

“ [I]356-luna ’ll be quite glad if [he]281-hagrid has , ”[356-luna] said [Luna]356-luna . “ [He]281-hagrid is n’t [a very good teacher]3856-a very good teacher , is [he]281-hagrid ? ”[356-luna]

“ Thank [you]156-harry , [Headmaster]3882-headmaster , ”[390-professor umbridge] [Professor Umbridge]390-professor umbridge simpered , “ for those kind words of welcome . ”[390-professor umbridge]

[She]390-professor umbridge sounded much more businesslike and now [her]390-professor umbridge words had a dull learned - by - heart sound to them .

“ [The Ministry of Magic]2890-the ministry of magic has always considered the education of [young witches]3887-young witches and [wizards]2967-wizards to be of vital importance . “ [Every headmaster]3894-every headmaster and [headmistress of [Hogwarts]13-hogwarts]3895-headmistress of hogwarts has brought something new to the weighty task of governing [this historic school]3896-this historic school , and that is as it should be , for without progress there will be stagnation and decay . [Harry]156-harry found [his]156-harry attentiveness ebbing , as though [his]156-harry brain was slipping in and out of tune . [She]172-hermione sat down . [Dumbledore]176-dumbledore clapped . [Harry]156-harry felt a rush of gratitude toward [Neville]342-neville . [Nobody else]1837-nobody else said anything . [Neville]342-neville , who appeared to have nothing more to say either , was gazing fondly at [his]342-neville moonlit cactus .

[Harry]156-harry lay back on [his]156-harry pillows while [Ron]333-ron bustled around the next bed , putting [his]333-ron things away . [He]156-harry felt shaken by the argument with [Seamus]393-seamus , whom [he]156-harry had always liked very much . [Harry]156-harry and [Ron]333-ron carefully avoided looking at [each other]1037-each other .

History of Magic was by common consent the most boring subject ever devised by [Wizard]403-wizard - kind . [Professor Binns]404-professor binns , [[their]1878-you ghost teacher]1879-their ghost teacher , had a wheezy , droning voice that was almost guaranteed to cause severe drowsiness within ten minutes , five in warm weather . [He]404-professor binns never varied the form of [their]1878-you lessons , but lectured [them]1878-you without pausing while [they]1878-you took notes , or rather , gazed sleepily into space . [Harry]156-harry and [Ron]333-ron had so far managed to scrape passes in this subject only by copying [Hermione]172-hermione ’s notes before exams ; [she]172-hermione alone seemed able to resist the soporific power of [Binns]404-professor binns ’s voice .

Today [they]1878-you suffered three - quarters of an hour ’s droning on the subject of giant wars . [Harry]156-harry heard just enough within the first ten minutes to appreciate dimly that in [another teacher]1880-another teacher ’s hands this subject might have been mildly interesting , but then [his]156-harry brain disengaged , and [he]156-harry spent the remaining thirty - five minutes playing hangman on a corner of [his]156-harry parchment with [Ron]333-ron , while [Hermione]172-hermione shot [them]1878-you filthy looks out of the corner of [her]172-hermione eye .

“ How would it be , ”[172-hermione] [she]172-hermione asked [them]1878-you coldly as [they]1878-you left [the classroom]1881-the classroom for break ( [Binns]404-professor binns drifting away through the blackboard ) , “ if [I]172-hermione refused to lend [you]1878-you [my]172-hermione notes this year ? ”[172-hermione]

“ [We]1878-you ’d fail [our]1878-you O.W.L.s , ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron . “ If [you]1878-you want that on [your]1878-you conscience , [Hermione]172-hermione ... ”[333-ron]

Just as [Harry]156-harry , [Ron]333-ron , and [Hermione]172-hermione had predicted , [Snape]249-snape could hardly have set [them]1906-them a more difficult , fiddly potion . The ingredients had to be added to the cauldron in precisely the right order and quantities ; the mixture had to be stirred exactly the right number of times , firstly in clockwise , then in counterclockwise directions ; the heat of the flames on which it was simmering had to be lowered to exactly the right level for a specific number of minutes before the final ingredient was added .

“ A light silver vapor should now be rising from [your]156-harry potion , ”[249-snape] called [Snape]249-snape , with ten minutes left to go .

“ Turn , please , to the introduction and read what [Imago]105-imago has to say on the matter of dream interpretation . Then divide into pairs . Use The Dream Oracle to interpret each other ’s most recent dreams . Carry on . ”[407-professor trelawney]

The one good thing to be said for this lesson was that it was not a double period . By the time [they]1935-they had all finished reading the introduction of the book , [they]1935-they had barely ten minutes left for dream interpretation . At the table next to [Harry]156-harry and [Ron]333-ron , [Dean]392-dean had paired up with [Neville]342-neville , who immediately embarked on a long - winded explanation of a nightmare involving a pair of giant scissors wearing [[his]342-neville grandmother]1936-his grandmother ’s best hat ; [Harry]156-harry and [Ron]333-ron merely looked at [each other]1037-each other glumly .

“ [I]333-ron never remember [my]333-ron dreams , ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron . “ [You]156-harry say one . ”[333-ron]

“ [You]156-harry must remember one of them , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry impatiently .

[He]156-harry was not going to share [his]156-harry dreams with [anyone]2811-anyone . “ Get out of it , [Peeves]413-peeves . ”[156-harry]

[She]172-hermione wrenched [her]172-hermione bag open ; [Harry]156-harry thought [she]172-hermione was about to put [her]172-hermione books away , but instead [she]172-hermione pulled out two misshapen woolly objects , placed them carefully on a table by the fireplace , covered them with a few screwed - up bits of parchment and a broken quill , and stood back to admire the effect .

“ [You]172-hermione ’re leaving out hats for [the house - elves]4060-the house - elves ? ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron slowly . “ And [you]172-hermione ’re covering them up with rubbish first ? ”[333-ron]

“ Yes , ”[172-hermione] said [Hermione]172-hermione defiantly , swinging [her]172-hermione bag onto [her]172-hermione back .

“ That ’s not on , ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron angrily . “ [You]172-hermione ’re trying to trick [them]4060-the house - elves into picking up the hats . [You]172-hermione ’re setting them free when [they]4060-the house - elves might not want to be free . ”[333-ron]

“ Of course [they]4060-the house - elves want to be free ! ”[172-hermione] said [Hermione]172-hermione at once , though [her]172-hermione face was turning pink . “ Do n’t [you]333-ron dare touch those hats , [Ron]333-ron ! ”[172-hermione]

[She]172-hermione left . [Ron]333-ron waited until [she]172-hermione had disappeared through the door to [[the girls]2025-the girls ’ dormitories]2026-the girls ’ dormitories , then cleared the rubbish off the woolly hats .

[Harry]156-harry shook [his]156-harry head , noticing as [he]156-harry did so that the ache in [his]156-harry right temple was getting worse . [He]156-harry thought of the long essay on giant wars and the pain stabbed at [him]156-harry sharply . “ [I]156-harry ’m going to bed too . ”[156-harry]

[He]156-harry passed [Seamus]393-seamus on the way to the door leading to [the dormitories]2027-the dormitories , but did not look at [him]393-seamus . The following day dawned just as leaden and rainy as the previous one . [Hagrid]281-hagrid was still absent from the staff table at breakfast .

“ But on the plus side , no Snape today , ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron bracingly .

[Hermione]172-hermione yawned widely and poured [herself]172-hermione some coffee . [Hermione]172-hermione did not speak to [him]333-ron all morning .

[They]2028-they then spent more than an hour reviewing Summoning Charms , which according to [Professor Flitwick]418-professor flitwick were bound to come up in [their]2028-they O.W.L. , and [he]418-professor flitwick rounded off the lesson by setting [them]2028-they [their]2028-they largest amount of Charms homework ever .

“ [I]398-angelina ’ll tell [you]156-harry what now , ”[398-angelina] [she]398-angelina said , marching straight up to [him]156-harry and poking [him]156-harry hard in the chest with [her]398-angelina finger . “ How come [you]156-harry ’ve landed [yourself]156-harry in detention for five o’clock on Friday ? ”[398-angelina]

“ What ? ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry . “ Why ... oh yeah , [Keeper]425-gryffindor tryouts ! ”[156-harry]

“ Now [he]156-harry remembers ! ”[398-angelina] snarled [Angelina]398-angelina . “ Did n’t [I]398-angelina tell [you]156-harry [I]398-angelina wanted to do a tryout with [the whole team]3942-the whole team , and find [someone who fitted in with [everyone]779-everyone]4086-someone who fitted in with everyone ? Did n’t [I]398-angelina tell [you]156-harry [I]398-angelina ’d booked the Quidditch pitch specially ? And now [you]156-harry ’ve decided [you]156-harry ’re not going to be [there]796-there ! ”[398-angelina]

“ [I]156-harry did n’t decide not to be [there]796-there ! ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry , stung by the injustice of these words . “ [I]156-harry got detention from [that Umbridge woman]3857-that umbridge woman , just because [I]156-harry told [her]3857-that umbridge woman the truth about [You]156-harry - Know - Who — ”[156-harry]

“ Well , [you]156-harry can just go straight to [her]3857-that umbridge woman and ask [her]3857-that umbridge woman to let [you]156-harry off on Friday , ”[398-angelina] said [Angelina]398-angelina fiercely , “ and [I]398-angelina do n’t care how [you]156-harry do it , tell [her]3857-that umbridge woman [You]156-harry - Know - Who ’s a figment of [your]156-harry imagination if [you]156-harry like , just make sure [you]156-harry ’re there ! ”[398-angelina]

[She]398-angelina stormed away .

“ [You]156-harry know what ? ”[156-harry] [Harry]156-harry said to [Ron]333-ron and [Hermione]172-hermione as [they]2072-they entered [the Great Hall]1722-the great hall . “ [I]156-harry think [we]2072-they ’d better check with [Puddlemere United]110-puddlemere united whether [Oliver Wood]399-oliver wood ’s been killed during a training session , because [she]3857-that umbridge woman seems to be channeling [his]3857-that umbridge woman spirit . ”[156-harry]

“ What d’you reckon are the odds of [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge letting [you]156-harry off on Friday ? ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron skeptically , as [they]2072-they sat down at the Gryffindor table .

“ Less than zero , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry glumly , tipping lamb chops onto [his]156-harry plate and starting to eat . “ Better try , though , had n’t [I]156-harry ? [I]156-harry ’ll offer to do two more detentions or something , [I]156-harry dunno ... ”[156-harry] [He]156-harry swallowed a mouthful of potato and added , “ [I]156-harry hope [she]3857-that umbridge woman does n’t keep [me]156-harry too long this evening . [Ron]333-ron moaned and for some reason glanced up at the ceiling .

“ And it looks like it ’s going to rain . ”[333-ron]

“ What ’s that got to do with [our]2072-they homework ? ”[172-hermione] said [Hermione]172-hermione , [her]172-hermione eyebrows raised .

“ Nothing , ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron at once , [his]333-ron ears reddening .

At five to five [Harry]156-harry bade [the other two]1874-the other two good - bye and set off for [[Umbridge]390-professor umbridge ’s office]2075-umbridge ’s office on [the third floor]1441-the third floor . When [he]156-harry knocked on the door [she]390-professor umbridge said , “ Come in , ”[390-professor umbridge] in a sugary voice . [He]156-harry entered cautiously , looking around .

[He]156-harry had known [this office]2077-this office under three of [[its]2077-this office previous occupants]2078-its previous occupants . In the days when [Gilderoy Lockhart]284-gilderoy lockhart had lived [here]524-here [it]2077-this office had been plastered in beaming portraits of [its owner]2080-its owner . When [Lupin]221-lupin had occupied [it]2077-this office , it was likely [you]2081-you would meet some fascinating Dark creature in a cage or tank if [you]2081-you came to call . In the impostor [Moody]224-moody ’s days [it]2077-this office had been packed with various instruments and artifacts for the detection of wrongdoing and concealment .

Now , however , [it]2077-this office looked totally unrecognizable . The surfaces had all been draped in lacy covers and cloths . There were several vases full of dried flowers , each residing on its own doily , and on one of the walls was a collection of ornamental plates , each decorated with a large Technicolored kitten wearing a different bow around its neck . These were so foul that [Harry]156-harry stared at them , transfixed , until [Professor Umbridge]390-professor umbridge spoke again .

“ Good evening , [Mr. Potter]411-mr. potter . ”[390-professor umbridge]

[Harry]156-harry started and looked around . [He]156-harry had not noticed [her]390-professor umbridge at first because [she]390-professor umbridge was wearing a luridly flowered set of robes that blended only too well with the tablecloth on the desk behind [her]390-professor umbridge .

“ Evening , ”[156-harry] [Harry]156-harry said stiffly .

“ Well , sit down , ”[390-professor umbridge] [she]390-professor umbridge said , pointing toward a small table draped in lace beside which [she]390-professor umbridge had drawn up a straight - backed chair . A piece of blank parchment lay on the table , apparently waiting for [him]156-harry .

“ Er , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry , without moving . “ [Professor Umbridge]390-professor umbridge ? Er — before [we]4091-we start , [I]156-harry - [I]156-harry wanted to ask [you]156-harry a ... a favor . ”[156-harry]

[Her]390-professor umbridge bulging eyes narrowed .

“ Oh yes ? ”[390-professor umbridge]

“ Well [I]390-professor umbridge ’m ... [I]390-professor umbridge ’m on [the Gryffindor Quidditch team]1987-the gryffindor quidditch team . And [I]390-professor umbridge was supposed to be at the tryouts for [the new Keeper at five o’clock]4093-the new keeper at five o’clock on Friday and [I]390-professor umbridge was — was wondering whether [I]390-professor umbridge could skip detention that night and do it — do it another night ... instead ... ”[390-professor umbridge]

[He]156-harry knew long before [he]156-harry reached the end of [his]156-harry sentence that it was no good .

“ Oh no , ”[390-professor umbridge] said [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge , smiling so widely that [she]390-professor umbridge looked as though [she]390-professor umbridge had just swallowed a particularly juicy fly . “ Oh no , no , no . This is [your]156-harry punishment for spreading evil , nasty , attention - seeking stories , [Mr. Potter]411-mr. potter , and punishments certainly can not be adjusted to suit [the guilty one]4094-the guilty one ’s convenience . No , [you]156-harry will come here at five o’clock tomorrow , and the next day , and on Friday too , and [you]156-harry will do [your]156-harry detentions as planned . [I]390-professor umbridge think it rather a good thing that [you]156-harry are missing something [you]156-harry really want to do . It ought to reinforce the lesson [I]390-professor umbridge am trying to teach [you]156-harry . ”[390-professor umbridge]

[Harry]156-harry felt the blood surge to [his]156-harry head and heard a thumping noise in [his]156-harry ears . So [he]156-harry told evil , nasty , attention - seeking stories , did [he]156-harry ?

[She]390-professor umbridge was watching [him]156-harry with [her]390-professor umbridge head slightly to one side , still smiling widely , as though [she]390-professor umbridge knew exactly what [he]156-harry was thinking and was waiting to see whether [he]156-harry would start shouting again . With a massive effort [Harry]156-harry looked away from [her]390-professor umbridge , dropped [his]156-harry schoolbag beside the straight - backed chair , and sat down .

“ There , ”[390-professor umbridge] said [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge sweetly , “ [we]4095-we ’re getting better at controlling [our]4095-we temper already , are n’t [we]4095-we ? Now , [you]156-harry are going to be doing some lines for [me]390-professor umbridge , [Mr. Potter]411-mr. potter . No , not with [your]156-harry quill , ”[390-professor umbridge] [she]390-professor umbridge added , as [Harry]156-harry bent down to open [his]156-harry bag . “ [You]156-harry ’re going to be using a rather special one of mine . Here [you]156-harry are . ”[390-professor umbridge]

[She]390-professor umbridge handed [him]156-harry a long , thin black quill with an unusually sharp point .

“ [I]390-professor umbridge want [you]156-harry to write ‘ [I]390-professor umbridge must not tell lies , ’ ”[390-professor umbridge] [she]390-professor umbridge told [him]156-harry softly .

“ How many times ? ”[156-harry] [Harry]156-harry asked , with a creditable imitation of politeness .

“ Oh , as long as it takes for the message to sink in , ”[390-professor umbridge] said [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge sweetly . “ Off [you]156-harry go . ”[390-professor umbridge]

[She]390-professor umbridge moved over to [her]390-professor umbridge desk , sat down , and bent over a stack of parchment that looked like essays for marking . [Harry]156-harry raised the sharp black quill and then realized what was missing .

“ [You]390-professor umbridge have n’t given [me]156-harry any ink , ”[156-harry] [he]156-harry said .

“ Oh , [you]156-harry wo n’t need ink , ”[390-professor umbridge] said [Professor Umbridge]390-professor umbridge with the merest suggestion of a laugh in [her]390-professor umbridge voice .

[Harry]156-harry placed the point of the quill on the paper and wrote : [I]0-i must not tell lies .

[He]156-harry let out a gasp of pain . The words had appeared on the parchment in what appeared to be shining red ink . At the same time , the words had appeared on the back of [Harry]156-harry ’s right hand , cut into [his]156-harry skin as though traced there by a scalpel — yet even as [he]156-harry stared at the shining cut , the skin healed over again , leaving the place where it had been slightly redder than before but quite smooth .

[Harry]156-harry looked around at [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge . [She]390-professor umbridge was watching [him]156-harry , [her]390-professor umbridge wide , toadlike mouth stretched in a smile .

“ Yes ? ”[390-professor umbridge]

“ Nothing , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry quietly .

[He]156-harry looked back at the parchment , placed the quill upon it once more , wrote [I]0-i must not tell lies , and felt the searing pain on the back of [his]156-harry hand for a second time ; once again the words had been cut into [his]156-harry skin , once again they healed over seconds later .

And on it went . Again and again [Harry]156-harry wrote the words on the parchment in what [he]156-harry soon came to realize was not ink , but [his]156-harry own blood . And again and again the words were cut into the back of [his]156-harry hand , healed , and then reappeared the next time [he]156-harry set quill to parchment .

Darkness fell outside [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge ’s window . [Harry]156-harry did not ask when [he]156-harry would be allowed to stop . [He]156-harry did not even check [his]156-harry watch . [He]156-harry knew [she]390-professor umbridge was watching [him]156-harry for signs of weakness and [he]156-harry was not going to show any , not even if [he]156-harry had to sit here all night , cutting open [his]156-harry own hand with this quill ...

“ Come here , ”[390-professor umbridge] [she]390-professor umbridge said , after what seemed hours .

[He]156-harry stood up . [His]156-harry hand was stinging painfully . When [he]156-harry looked down at it [he]156-harry saw that the cut had healed , but that the skin there was red raw .

“ Hand , ”[390-professor umbridge] [she]390-professor umbridge said .

[He]156-harry extended it . [She]390-professor umbridge took it in [her]390-professor umbridge own . [Harry]156-harry repressed a shudder as [she]390-professor umbridge touched [him]156-harry with [her]390-professor umbridge thick , stubby fingers on which [she]390-professor umbridge wore a number of ugly old rings .

“ Tut , tut , [I]390-professor umbridge do n’t seem to have made much of an impression yet , ”[390-professor umbridge] [she]390-professor umbridge said , smiling . “ Well , [we]4096-we ’ll just have to try again tomorrow evening , wo n’t [we]4096-we ? [You]156-harry may go . ”[390-professor umbridge]

[Harry]156-harry left [[her]390-professor umbridge office]1984-her office without a word . [The school]1756-the school was quite deserted ; it was surely past midnight . [He]156-harry walked slowly up [the corridor]1261-the corridor then , when [he]156-harry had turned the corner and was sure that [she]390-professor umbridge would not hear [him]156-harry , broke into a run .

[He]156-harry had not had time to practice Vanishing Spells , had not written a single dream in [his]156-harry dream diary , and had not finished the drawing of the bowtruckle , nor had [he]156-harry written [his]156-harry essays . [He]156-harry skipped breakfast next morning to scribble down a couple of made - up dreams for Divination , [their]2085-their first lesson , and was surprised to find a disheveled [Ron]333-ron keeping [him]156-harry company .

“ How come [you]333-ron did n’t do it last night ? ”[156-harry] [Harry]156-harry asked , as [Ron]333-ron stared wildly around [the common room]1850-the common room for inspiration . [Ron]333-ron , who had been fast asleep when [Harry]156-harry got back to [the dormitory]1829-the dormitory , muttered something about “ doing other stuff , ”[333-ron] bent low over [his]333-ron parchment , and scrawled a few words .

“ That ’ll have to do , ”[156-harry] [he]156-harry said , slamming the diary shut , “ [I]156-harry ’ve said [I]156-harry dreamed [I]156-harry was buying a new pair of shoes , [she]4097-she ca n’t make anything weird out of that , can [she]4097-she ? ”[156-harry]

[They]2085-their hurried off to [North Tower]104-north tower together .

“ How was detention with [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge , anyway ? What did [she]4097-she make [you]156-harry do ? ”[2085-their]

[Harry]156-harry hesitated for a fraction of a second , then said , “ Lines . ”[156-harry]

“ That ’s not too bad , then , eh ? ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron .

“ Nope , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry .

“ No , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry .

[Ron]333-ron groaned sympathetically .

It was another bad day for [Harry]156-harry ; [he]156-harry was one of the worst in Transfiguration , not having practiced Vanishing Spells at all . [He]156-harry had to give up [his]156-harry lunch hour to complete the picture of the bowtruckle , and meanwhile , [Professors McGonagall]426-professors mcgonagall , [Grubbly - Plank]377-professor grubbly - plank , and [Sinistra]397-professor sinistra gave [them]426-professors mcgonagall yet more homework , which [he]156-harry had no prospect of finishing that evening because of [his]156-harry second detention with [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge . To cap it all , [Angelina Johnson]398-angelina tracked [him]156-harry down at dinner again and , on learning that [he]156-harry would not be able to attend Friday ’s Keeper tryouts , told [him]156-harry [she]398-angelina was not at all impressed by [his]156-harry attitude and that [she]398-angelina expected players who wished to remain on [the team]3945-the team to put training before [their]2089-their other commitments .

“ [I]156-harry ’m in [detention]3732-detention ! ”[156-harry] [Harry]156-harry yelled after [her]398-angelina as [she]398-angelina stalked away . “ [D’you]4099-d’you think [I]156-harry ’d rather be stuck in [a room]3933-a room with [that old toad]4101-that old toad or playing [Quidditch]329-gryffindor ? ”[156-harry]

“ At least it ’s only lines , ”[172-hermione] said [Hermione]172-hermione consolingly , as [Harry]156-harry sank back onto [his]156-harry bench and looked down at [his]156-harry steak - and - kidney pie , which [he]156-harry no longer fancied very much . “ It ’s not as if it ’s a dreadful punishment , really ... ”[156-harry]

[Harry]156-harry opened [his]156-harry mouth , closed it again , and nodded . [He]156-harry was not really sure why [he]156-harry was not telling [Ron]333-ron and [Hermione]172-hermione exactly what was happening in [[Umbridge]390-professor umbridge ’s room]2090-umbridge ’s room : [He]156-harry only knew that [he]156-harry did not want to see [their]2091-their looks of horror ; that would make the whole thing seem worse and therefore more difficult to face . [He]156-harry also felt dimly that this was between [himself]156-harry and [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge , a private battle of wills , and [he]156-harry was not going to give [her]172-hermione the satisfaction of hearing that [he]156-harry had complained about it .

“ [I]333-ron ca n’t believe how much homework [we]4102-we ’ve got , ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron miserably .

“ Well , why did n’t [you]156-harry do any last night ? ”[172-hermione] [Hermione]172-hermione asked [him]156-harry . “ Where were [you]156-harry anyway ? ”[172-hermione]

“ [I]333-ron was ... [I]333-ron fancied a walk , ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron shiftily .

[Harry]156-harry had the distinct impression that [he]156-harry was not alone in concealing things at the moment .

The second detention was just as bad as the previous one . The skin on the back of [Harry]156-harry ’s hand became irritated more quickly now , red and inflamed ; [Harry]156-harry thought it unlikely to keep healing as effectively for long . Soon the cut would remain etched in [his]156-harry hand and [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge would , perhaps , be satisfied . [He]156-harry let no moan of pain escape [him]156-harry , however , and from the moment of entering [the room]707-the room to the moment of [his]156-harry dismissal , again past midnight , [he]156-harry said nothing but “ Good evening ”[156-harry] and “ Good night . ”[156-harry]

[His]156-harry homework situation , however , was now desperate , and when [he]156-harry returned to [the Gryffindor common room]1817-the gryffindor common room [he]156-harry did not , though exhausted , go to bed , but opened [his]156-harry books and began [Snape]249-snape ’s moonstone essay . It was half - past two by the time [he]156-harry had finished it . [He]156-harry knew [he]156-harry had done a poor job , but there was no help for it ; unless [he]156-harry had something to give in [he]156-harry would be in detention with [Snape]249-snape next . [He]156-harry then dashed off answers to the questions [Professor McGonagall]306-professor mcgonagall had set them , cobbled together something on the proper handling of bowtruckles for [Professor Grubbly - Plank]377-professor grubbly - plank , and staggered up to bed , where [he]156-harry fell fully clothed on top of the bed covers and fell asleep immediately .

[Thursday]427-thursday passed in a haze of tiredness . [Ron]333-ron seemed very sleepy too , though [Harry]156-harry could not see why [he]333-ron should be . [Harry]156-harry ’s third detention passed in the same way as the previous two , except that after two hours the words “ [I]390-professor umbridge must not tell lies ”[390-professor umbridge] did not fade from the back of [Harry]156-harry ’s hand , but remained scratched there , oozing droplets of blood . The pause in the pointed quill ’s scratching made [Professor Umbridge]390-professor umbridge look up .

“ Ah , ”[390-professor umbridge] [she]390-professor umbridge said softly , moving around [her]390-professor umbridge desk to examine [his]156-harry hand [herself]390-professor umbridge . “ Good . That ought to serve as a reminder to [you]156-harry , ought n’t it ? [You]156-harry may leave for tonight . ”[390-professor umbridge]

“ Do [I]156-harry still have to come back tomorrow ? ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry , picking up [his]156-harry schoolbag with [his]156-harry left hand rather than [his]156-harry smarting right .

“ Oh yes , ”[390-professor umbridge] said [Professor Umbridge]390-professor umbridge , smiling widely as before . “ Yes , [I]390-professor umbridge think [we]4103-we can etch the message a little deeper with another evening ’s work . ”[390-professor umbridge]

[He]156-harry had never before considered the possibility that there might be [another teacher in [the world]577-the world [he]156-harry hated more than [Snape]249-snape]2094-another teacher in the world he hated more than snape , but as [he]156-harry walked back toward [Gryffindor Tower]107-gryffindor tower [he]156-harry had to admit [he]156-harry had found [a contender]2096-a contender . [She]2096-a contender ’s evil , [he]156-harry thought , as [he]156-harry climbed a staircase to [the seventh floor]2097-the seventh floor , [she]2096-a contender ’s [an evil , twisted , mad , old]2098-an evil , twisted , mad , old —

“ [Ron]333-ron ? ”[2096-a contender]

[He]156-harry had reached the top of [the stairs]801-the stairs , turned right , and almost walked into [Ron]333-ron , who was lurking behind a statue of [Lachlan the Lanky]428-lachlan the lanky , clutching [his]333-ron broomstick . [He]156-harry gave a great leap of surprise when [he]156-harry saw [Harry]156-harry and attempted to hide [his]156-harry new Cleansweep Eleven behind [his]156-harry back .

“ What are [you]333-ron doing ? ”[156-harry]

“ Er — nothing . What are [you]333-ron doing ? ”[156-harry]

[He]333-ron was talking in a very fast , feverish way .

“ But what have [you]333-ron got [your]333-ron broom for , [you]333-ron have n’t been flying , have [you]333-ron ? ”[156-harry] [Harry]156-harry asked .

“ [I]333-ron — well — well , okay , [I]333-ron ’ll tell [you]156-harry , but do n’t laugh , all right ? ”[333-ron] [Ron]333-ron said defensively , turning redder with every second . “ [I]333-ron - [I]333-ron thought [I]333-ron ’d try out for [Gryffindor Keeper]425-gryffindor now [I]333-ron ’ve got a decent broom . “ [I]156-harry ’m not laughing , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry . [Ron]333-ron blinked . “ It ’s a brilliant idea ! It ’d be really cool if [you]156-harry got on [the team]3945-the team ! [I]333-ron ’ve never seen [you]333-ron play [Keeper]4108-keeper , are [you]333-ron good ? ”[333-ron]

“ [I]333-ron ’m not bad , ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron , who looked immensely relieved at [Harry]156-harry ’s reaction . “ [Charlie]252-charlie , [Fred]244-fred , and [George]245-george always made [me]333-ron Keep for [them]4109-they when [they]4109-they were training during the holidays . ”[333-ron]

“ So [you]333-ron ’ve been practicing tonight ? ”[333-ron]

“ Every evening since Tuesday ... just on [my]333-ron own , though , [I]333-ron ’ve been trying to bewitch [Quaffles]429-quaffles to fly at [me]333-ron , but it has n’t been easy and [I]333-ron do n’t know how much use it ’ll be . ”[333-ron] [Ron]333-ron looked nervous and anxious . “ [Fred]244-fred and [George]245-george are going to laugh [themselves]4109-they stupid when [I]333-ron turn up for the tryouts . [They]4109-they have n’t stopped taking the mickey out of [me]333-ron since [I]333-ron got made [a prefect]3717-a prefect . ”[333-ron]

“ [I]156-harry wish [I]156-harry was going to be [there]796-there , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry bitterly , as [they]2100-they set off together toward [the common room]1850-the common room .

“ Yeah , so do — [Harry]156-harry , what ’s that on the back of [your]156-harry hand ? ”[333-ron]

[Harry]156-harry , who had just scratched [his]156-harry nose with [his]156-harry free right hand , tried to hide it , but had as much success as [Ron]333-ron with [his]333-ron Cleansweep .

“ It ’s just a cut — it ’s nothing — it ’s — ”[333-ron]

But [Ron]333-ron had grabbed [Harry]156-harry ’s forearm and pulled the back of [Harry]156-harry ’s hand up level with [his]333-ron eyes . There was a pause , during which [he]333-ron stared at the words carved into the skin , then [he]333-ron released [Harry]156-harry , looking sick .

“ [I]333-ron thought [you]333-ron said [she]4112-she was giving [you]333-ron lines ? ”[333-ron]

[Harry]156-harry hesitated , but after all , [Ron]333-ron had been honest with [him]156-harry , so [he]333-ron told [Ron]333-ron the truth about the hours [he]333-ron had been spending in [[Umbridge]390-professor umbridge ’s office]2075-umbridge ’s office .

“ [The old hag]4113-the old hag ! ”[333-ron] [Ron]333-ron said in a revolted whisper as [they]2103-they came to a halt in front of [the Fat Lady]1818-the fat lady , who was dozing peacefully with [her]1818-the fat lady head against [her]1818-the fat lady frame . “ [She]4112-she ’s sick ! Go to [McGonagall]306-professor mcgonagall , say something ! ”[1818-the fat lady]

“ No , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry at once . “ [I]156-harry ’m not giving [her]4112-she the satisfaction of knowing [she]4112-she ’s got to [me]156-harry . ”[156-harry]

“ Got to [you]333-ron ? [You]333-ron ca n’t let [her]4112-she get away with this ! ”[1818-the fat lady]

“ [I]156-harry do n’t know how much power [McGonagall]306-professor mcgonagall ’s got over [her]4112-she , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry .

“ [Dumbledore]176-dumbledore , then , tell [Dumbledore]176-dumbledore ! ”[1818-the fat lady]

“ No , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry flatly .

“ Why not ? ”[1818-the fat lady]

“ [He]176-dumbledore ’s got enough on [his]176-dumbledore mind , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry , but that was not the true reason . [He]156-harry was not going to go to [Dumbledore]176-dumbledore for help when [Dumbledore]176-dumbledore had not spoken to [him]156-harry once since last [June]430-june .

“ Well , [I]333-ron reckon [you]156-harry should — ”[333-ron] [Ron]333-ron began , but [he]333-ron was interrupted by the Fat Lady , who had been watching [them]2105-them sleepily and now burst out , “ Are [you]156-harry going to give [me]333-ron the password or will [I]333-ron have to stay awake all night waiting for [you]156-harry to finish [your]156-harry conversation ? ”[333-ron]

Friday dawned sullen and sodden as the rest of the week . Though [Harry]156-harry glanced toward the staff table automatically when [he]156-harry entered [the Great Hall]1722-the great hall , it was without real hope of seeing [Hagrid]281-hagrid and [he]156-harry turned [his]156-harry mind immediately to [his]156-harry more pressing problems , such as the mountainous pile of homework [he]156-harry had to do and the prospect of yet another detention with [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge .

Two things sustained [Harry]156-harry that day . One was the thought that it was almost the weekend ; the other was that , dreadful though [his]156-harry final detention with [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge was sure to be , [he]156-harry had a distant view of the Quidditch pitch from [her]390-professor umbridge window and might , with luck , be able to see something of [Ron]333-ron ’s tryout . These were rather feeble rays of light , it was true , but [Harry]156-harry was grateful for anything that might lighten [his]156-harry present darkness ; [he]156-harry had never had a worse first week of term at [Hogwarts]13-hogwarts .

At five o’clock that evening [he]156-harry knocked on [[Professor Umbridge]390-professor umbridge ’s office]2107-professor umbridge ’s office door for what [he]156-harry sincerely hoped would be the final time , was told to enter and did so . The blank parchment lay ready for [him]156-harry on the lace - covered table , the pointed black quill beside it .

“ [You]156-harry know what to do , [Mr. Potter]411-mr. potter , ”[390-professor umbridge] said [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge , smiling sweetly over at [him]156-harry .

[Harry]156-harry picked up the quill and glanced through the window . If [he]156-harry just shifted [his]156-harry chair an inch or so to the right ... On the pretext of shifting [himself]156-harry closer to the table [he]156-harry managed it . [He]156-harry now had a distant view of [the Gryffindor Quidditch team]1987-the gryffindor quidditch team soaring up and down [the pitch]2109-the pitch , while [half a dozen black figures]2110-half a dozen black figures stood at the foot of the three high goalposts , apparently awaiting [their]2110-half a dozen black figures turn to [Keep]115-keep . It was impossible to tell which one was [Ron]333-ron at this distance .

[I]0-i must not tell lies , [Harry]156-harry wrote . The cut in the back of [his]156-harry right hand opened and began to bleed afresh .

[I]0-i must not tell lies . The cut dug deeper , stinging and smarting .

[I]0-i must not tell lies . Blood trickled down [his]156-harry wrist .

[He]156-harry chanced another glance out of the window . [Whoever was defending the goalposts]2111-whoever was defending the goalposts now was doing a very poor job indeed . [Katie Bell]385-katie scored twice in the few seconds [Harry]156-harry dared watch . Hoping very much that [the Keeper]2112-the keeper was n’t [Ron]333-ron , [he]156-harry dropped [his]156-harry eyes back to the parchment dotted with blood .

[I]0-i must not tell lies .

[I]0-i must not tell lies .

[He]156-harry looked up whenever [he]156-harry thought [he]156-harry could risk it , when [he]156-harry could hear the scratching of [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge ’s quill or the opening of a desk drawer . [The third person]2113-the third person to try out was pretty good , the fourth was terrible , [the fifth]2114-the fifth dodged [a Bludger]2115-a bludger exceptionally well but then fumbled an easy save . [I]0-i must not tell lies .

[I]0-i must not tell lies .

The parchment was now shining with drops of blood from the back of [his]156-harry hand , which was searing with pain . When [he]156-harry next looked up , night had fallen and the Quidditch pitch was no longer visible .

“ Let ’s see if [you]156-harry ’ve gotten the message yet , shall [we]4114-we ? ”[390-professor umbridge] said [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge ’s soft voice half an hour later .

[She]390-professor umbridge moved toward [him]156-harry , stretching out [her]390-professor umbridge short be - ringed fingers for [his]156-harry arm . At the same time , [he]156-harry had a most peculiar sensation somewhere around [his]156-harry midriff .

[He]156-harry wrenched [his]156-harry arm out of [her]390-professor umbridge grip and leapt to [his]156-harry feet , staring at [her]390-professor umbridge . [She]390-professor umbridge looked back at [him]156-harry , a smile stretching [her]390-professor umbridge wide , slack mouth .

“ Yes , it hurts , does n’t it ? ”[390-professor umbridge] [she]390-professor umbridge said softly .

[He]156-harry did not answer . [His]156-harry heart was thumping very hard and fast . Was [she]390-professor umbridge talking about [his]156-harry hand or did [she]390-professor umbridge know what [he]156-harry had just felt in [his]156-harry forehead ?

“ Well , [I]390-professor umbridge think [I]390-professor umbridge ’ve made [my]390-professor umbridge point , [Mr. Potter]411-mr. potter . [You]411-mr. potter may go . ”[390-professor umbridge]

[He]156-harry caught up [his]156-harry schoolbag and left [the room]707-the room as quickly as [he]156-harry could .

“ Mimbulus mimbletonia ! ”[156-harry] [he]156-harry gasped at the Fat Lady , who swung forward once more .

[Harry]156-harry looked into [her]172-hermione face , which was shining with glee , and tried to look as though [he]156-harry was vaguely tempted by this offer .

“ Er ... no , [I]156-harry do n’t think [I]156-harry will , thanks , ”[156-harry] [he]156-harry said . “ Er — not tomorrow . [I]156-harry ’ve got loads of homework to do ... ”[156-harry]

And [he]156-harry traipsed off to [[the boys]2824-the boys ’ stairs]2126-the boys ’ stairs , leaving [her]172-hermione looking slightly disappointed behind [him]156-harry .

[Harry]156-harry was the first to awake in [[his]156-harry dormitory]2127-his dormitory next morning . [He]156-harry lay for a moment watching dust swirl in the chink of sunlight falling through the gap in [his]156-harry four - poster ’s hangings and savored the thought that it was Saturday . The first week of term seemed to have dragged on forever , like one gigantic History of Magic lesson .

Judging by the sleepy silence and the freshly minted look of that beam of sunlight , it was just after daybreak . [He]156-harry pulled open the curtains around [his]156-harry bed , got up , and started to dress . The only sound apart from the distant twittering of birds was the slow , deep breathing of [his]156-harry fellow Gryffindors . [He]156-harry opened [his]156-harry schoolbag carefully , pulled out parchment and quill , and headed out of [the dormitory]1829-the dormitory for [the common room]1850-the common room .

Making straight for [[his]156-harry favorite squashy old armchair beside the now extinct fire]2130-his favorite squashy old armchair beside the now extinct fire , [Harry]156-harry settled [himself]156-harry down comfortably and unrolled [his]156-harry parchment while looking around [the room]707-the room . The detritus of crumpled - up bits of parchment , old Gobstones , empty ingredient jars , and candy wrappers that usually covered [the common room]1850-the common room at the end of each day was gone , as were all [Hermione]172-hermione ’s elf hats . Wondering vaguely how many elves had now been set free whether [they]2133-they wanted to be or not , [Harry]156-harry uncorked [his]156-harry ink bottle , dipped [his]156-harry quill into it , and then held it suspended an inch above the smooth yellowish surface of [his]156-harry parchment , thinking hard ... But after a minute or so [he]156-harry found [himself]156-harry staring into the empty grate , at a complete loss for what to say .

[He]156-harry could now appreciate how hard it had been for [Ron]333-ron and [Hermione]172-hermione to write [him]156-harry letters over the summer . How was [he]156-harry supposed to tell [Sirius]174-sirius everything that had happened over the past week and pose all the questions [he]156-harry was burning to ask without giving potential letter - thieves a lot of information [he]156-harry did not want [them]2134-them to have ?

[He]156-harry sat quite motionless for a while , gazing into the fireplace , then , finally coming to a decision , [he]156-harry dipped [his]156-harry quill into the ink bottle once more and set it resolutely upon the parchment .

[Harry]156-harry reread this letter several times , trying to see it from the point of view of [an outsider]2135-an outsider . [He]156-harry could not see how [they]2134-them would know what [he]156-harry was talking about — or who [he]156-harry was talking to — just from reading this letter . [He]156-harry did hope [Sirius]174-sirius would pick up the hint about [Hagrid]281-hagrid and tell [them]2134-them when [he]156-harry might be back : [Harry]156-harry did not want to ask directly in case it drew too much attention to what [Hagrid]281-hagrid might be up to while [he]156-harry was not at [Hogwarts]13-hogwarts .

Considering it was a very short letter it had taken a long time to write ; sunlight had crept halfway across [the room]707-the room while [he]156-harry had been working on it , and [he]156-harry could now hear distant sounds of movement from [the dormitories above]2137-the dormitories above . Sealing the parchment carefully [he]156-harry climbed through the portrait hole and headed off for [the Owlery]116-the owlery .

“ [I]381-nearly headless nick would not go that way if [I]381-nearly headless nick were [you]156-harry , ”[381-nearly headless nick] said [Nearly Headless Nick]381-nearly headless nick , drifting disconcertingly through a wall just ahead of [him]156-harry as [he]156-harry walked down [the passage]2138-the passage . “ [Peeves]413-peeves is planning an amusing joke on [the next person to pass the bust of [Paracelsus]436-paracelsus halfway down [the corridor]1261-the corridor]4126-the next person to pass the bust of paracelsus halfway down the corridor . ”[156-harry]

“ Does it involve [Paracelsus]436-paracelsus falling on top of [the person]4128-the person ’s head ? ”[156-harry] asked [Harry]156-harry .

“ Funnily enough , it does , ”[381-nearly headless nick] said [Nearly Headless Nick]381-nearly headless nick in a bored voice . “ Subtlety has never been [Peeves]413-peeves ’s strong point . [I]381-nearly headless nick ’m off to try and find the Bloody Baron ... [He]413-peeves might be able to put a stop to it ... See [you]156-harry , [Harry]156-harry ... ”[381-nearly headless nick]

“ Yeah , ’ bye , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry and instead of turning right , [he]156-harry turned left , taking a longer but safer route up to [the Owlery]2139-the owlery . [His]156-harry spirits rose as [he]156-harry walked past window after window showing brilliantly blue sky ; [he]156-harry had training later , [he]156-harry would be back on [the Quidditch]329-gryffindor pitch at last —

Something brushed [his]156-harry ankles . [He]156-harry looked down and saw [the caretaker]3876-the caretaker ’s skeletal gray cat , [Mrs. Norris]437-mrs. norris , slinking past [him]156-harry . [She]437-mrs. norris turned lamplike yellow eyes upon [him]156-harry for a moment before disappearing behind a statue of [Wilfred the Wistful]438-wilfred the wistful .

“ [I]156-harry ’m not doing anything wrong , ”[156-harry] [Harry]156-harry called after [her]437-mrs. norris . [She]437-mrs. norris had the unmistakable air of a cat that was off to report to [[her]437-mrs. norris boss]2141-her boss , yet [Harry]156-harry could not see why ; [he]156-harry was perfectly entitled to walk up to [the Owlery]116-the owlery on a Saturday morning .

The sun was high in the sky now and when [Harry]156-harry entered [the Owlery]2139-the owlery the glassless windows dazzled [his]156-harry eyes ; thick silvery beams of sunlight crisscrossed [the circular room in which hundreds of owls nestled on rafters]2143-the circular room in which hundreds of owls nestled on rafters , a little restless in the early morning light , some clearly just returned from hunting . The straw - covered floor crunched a little as [he]156-harry stepped across tiny animal bones , craning [his]156-harry neck for a sight of [Hedwig]213-hedwig .

“ There [you]437-mrs. norris are , ”[156-harry] [he]156-harry said , spotting [her]437-mrs. norris somewhere near the very top of the vaulted ceiling . “ Get down here , [I]156-harry ’ve got a letter for [you]437-mrs. norris . ”[156-harry]

With a low hoot [she]437-mrs. norris stretched [her]437-mrs. norris great white wings and soared down onto [his]156-harry shoulder .

“ Right , [I]156-harry know this says ‘ Snuffles ’ on the outside , ”[156-harry] [he]156-harry told [her]437-mrs. norris , giving [her]437-mrs. norris the letter to clasp in [her]437-mrs. norris beak and , without knowing exactly why , whispering , “ but it ’s for [Sirius]174-sirius , okay ? ”[156-harry]

[She]437-mrs. norris blinked [her]437-mrs. norris amber eyes once and [he]156-harry took that to mean that [she]437-mrs. norris understood .

“ Safe flight , then , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry and [he]156-harry carried [her]437-mrs. norris to one of the windows ; with a moment ’s pressure on [his]156-harry arm Hedwig took off into the blindingly bright sky . [He]156-harry watched [her]437-mrs. norris until [she]437-mrs. norris became a tiny black speck and vanished , then switched [his]156-harry gaze to [[Hagrid]281-hagrid ’s hut]2144-hagrid ’s hut , clearly visible from this window , and just as clearly uninhabited , the chimney smokeless , the curtains drawn .

[The treetops of [the Forbidden Forest]118-the forbidden forest]2145-the treetops of the forbidden forest swayed in a light breeze . [Harry]156-harry watched [them]2145-the treetops of the forbidden forest , savoring the fresh air on [his]156-harry face , thinking about [Quidditch]329-gryffindor later ... and then [he]156-harry saw it . A great , reptilian winged horse , just like the ones pulling [the Hogwarts carriages]2146-the hogwarts carriages , with leathery black wings spread wide like a pterodactyl ’s , rose up out of the trees like a grotesque , giant bird . It soared in a great circle and then plunged once more into the trees . The whole thing had happened so quickly [Harry]156-harry could hardly believe what [he]156-harry had seen , except that [his]156-harry heart was hammering madly .

The Owlery door opened behind [him]156-harry . [He]156-harry leapt in shock , and turning quickly , saw [Cho Chang]359-cho holding a letter and a parcel in [her]359-cho hands .

“ Hi , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry automatically .

“ Oh ... hi , ”[359-cho] [she]359-cho said breathlessly . “ [I]359-cho did n’t think [anyone]2811-anyone would be up here this early ... [I]359-cho only remembered five minutes ago , it ’s [[my]359-cho mum]2909-my mum ’s birthday . ”[359-cho]

[She]359-cho held up the parcel .

“ Right , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry . [His]156-harry brain seemed to have jammed . [He]156-harry wanted to say something funny and interesting , but the memory of that terrible winged horse was fresh in [his]156-harry mind .

“ Nice day , ”[156-harry] [he]156-harry said , gesturing to the windows . [His]156-harry insides seemed to shrivel with embarrassment . The weather . [He]156-harry was talking about the weather ...

“ No , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry .

[Cho]359-cho had selected one of [the school barn]2147-the school barn owls . [She]359-cho coaxed it down onto [her]359-cho arm where it held out an obliging leg so that [she]359-cho could attach the parcel .

[Cho]359-cho looked up , the parcel only half - attached to the owl ’s legs .

[Harry]156-harry ’s insides reinflated so rapidly [he]156-harry felt as though [he]156-harry might actually float a few inches off the dropping - strewn floor . [Mrs. Norris]437-mrs. norris came trotting at [his]389-filch heels , gazing up at the owls overhead and mewing hungrily . [Harry]156-harry reversed away from [the others]615-the others to the far side of [the pitch]2109-the pitch . [Ron]333-ron fell back toward the opposite goal . [Angelina]398-angelina raised the Quaffle with one hand and threw it hard to [Fred]244-fred , who passed to [George]245-george , who passed to [Harry]156-harry , who passed to [Ron]333-ron , who dropped it .

[The Slytherins]395-the slytherins , led by [Malfoy]297-malfoy , roared and screamed with laughter . [Ron]333-ron , who had pelted toward the ground to catch the Quaffle before it landed , pulled out of the dive untidily , so that [he]333-ron slipped sideways on [his]333-ron broom , and returned to playing height , blushing . [Harry]156-harry saw [Fred]244-fred and [George]245-george exchange looks , but uncharacteristically neither of [them]395-the slytherins said anything , for which [he]156-harry was grateful .

“ Pass it on , [Ron]333-ron , ”[398-angelina] called [Angelina]398-angelina , as though nothing had happened .

[He]156-harry knew that [half the people inside [Hogwarts]13-hogwarts]2221-half the people inside hogwarts thought [him]156-harry strange , even mad ; [he]156-harry knew that [the Daily Prophet]3275-the daily prophet had been making snide allusions to [him]156-harry for months , but there was something about seeing it written down like that in [Percy]253-percy ’s writing , about knowing that [Percy]253-percy was advising [Ron]333-ron to drop [him]156-harry and even to tell tales on [him]156-harry to [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge , that made [his]156-harry situation real to [him]156-harry as nothing else had . [He]156-harry had known [Percy]253-percy for four years , had stayed in [[his]253-percy house]2223-his house during the summers , shared a tent with [him]253-percy during the Quidditch World Cup , had even been awarded full marks by [him]253-percy in the second task of the Triwizard Tournament last year , yet now , [Percy]253-percy thought [him]156-harry unbalanced and possibly violent .

“ [I]156-harry was starting to think [you]172-hermione ’d go to bed before [everyone else]963-everyone else had disappeared , ”[156-harry] [he]156-harry said . “ [I]156-harry ’ve been checking every hour . ”[156-harry]
