“ Well , [I]174-sirius think [a girl]4175-a girl — first year by the look of [her]4175-a girl — might ’ve got a glimpse of [me]174-sirius earlier , but do n’t worry , ”[174-sirius] [Sirius]174-sirius said hastily , as [Hermione]172-hermione clapped a hand to [her]172-hermione mouth . “ [I]174-sirius was gone the moment [she]4175-a girl looked back at [me]174-sirius and [I]174-sirius ’ll bet [she]4175-a girl just thought [I]174-sirius was an oddly shaped log or something . ”[174-sirius]

“ But [Sirius]174-sirius , this is taking an awful risk — ”[172-hermione] [Hermione]172-hermione began .

“ [You]174-sirius sound like [Molly]266-molly , ”[174-sirius] said [Sirius]174-sirius . “ This was the only way [I]174-sirius could come up with of answering [Harry]156-harry ’s letter without resorting to a code — and codes are breakable . ”[174-sirius]

At the mention of [Harry]156-harry ’s letter , [Hermione]172-hermione and [Ron]333-ron had both turned to stare at [him]174-sirius .

“ [You]156-harry did n’t say [you]156-harry ’d written to [Sirius]174-sirius ! ”[172-hermione] said [Hermione]172-hermione accusingly .

“ [I]156-harry forgot , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry , which was perfectly true ; [his]156-harry meeting with [Cho]359-cho in [the Owlery]116-the owlery had driven everything before it out of [his]156-harry mind . “ Do n’t look at [me]359-cho like that , [Hermione]172-hermione , there was no way [anyone]2811-anyone would have got secret information out of it , was there , [Sirius]174-sirius ? ”[359-cho]

[Many of the students]1777-many of the students exchanged looks of glee . “ As [I]1777-many of the students was saying , today [we]4256-we shall be practicing the altogether more difficult vanishment of mice . “ Hem , hem . ”[390-professor umbridge]

[Professor Umbridge]390-professor umbridge looked as though [she]390-professor umbridge had just been slapped in the face . “ As [I]306-professor mcgonagall was saying , the Vanishing Spell becomes more difficult with the complexity of the animal to be vanished . “ [We]4283-we were n’t saying anything like that , [mate]3043-mate , ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron , looking aghast . “ [We]4283-we were n’t having a go at [Diggory]173-cedric , [we]4283-we did n’t — [you]4281-you ’ve got the wrong end of the — ”[333-ron]

[He]333-ron looked helplessly at [Hermione]172-hermione , whose face was stricken .

“ [Harry]156-harry , ”[172-hermione] [she]172-hermione said timidly , “ do n’t [you]156-harry see ? This ... this is exactly why [we]4283-we need [you]156-harry ... It was the first time [she]172-hermione had ever said [Voldemort]471-v - voldemort ’s name , and it was this , more than anything else , that calmed [Harry]156-harry . [He]156-harry wished [he]156-harry had not smashed the bowl of murtlap essence .

“ Well ... think about it , ”[172-hermione] said [Hermione]172-hermione quietly . “ Please ? ”[172-hermione]

[Harry]156-harry could not think of anything to say . [He]156-harry was feeling ashamed of [his]156-harry outburst already . [He]156-harry nodded , hardly aware of what [he]156-harry was agreeing to .

[Hermione]172-hermione stood up .

“ Well , [I]172-hermione ’m off to bed , ”[172-hermione] [she]172-hermione said in a voice that was clearly as natural as [she]172-hermione could make it . “ Erm ... ’ night . ”[172-hermione]

[Ron]333-ron had gotten to [his]333-ron feet too .

[He]156-harry indicated the smashed bowl on the floor . [Ron]333-ron nodded and left .

[Harry]156-harry had never before appreciated just how beautiful [the village of Hogsmeade]2407-the village of hogsmeade was .

[Harry]156-harry felt happier for the rest of the weekend than [he]156-harry had done all term . [He]156-harry and [Ron]333-ron spent much of Sunday catching up with all [their]2408-their homework again , and although this could hardly be called fun , the last burst of autumn sunshine persisted , so rather than sitting hunched over tables in [the common room]1850-the common room , [they]2408-their took [their]2408-their work outside and lounged in the shade of a large beech tree on [the edge of [the lake]1667-the lake]2410-the edge of the lake . [Hermione]172-hermione , who of course was up to date with all [her]172-hermione work , brought more wool outside with [her]172-hermione and bewitched [her]172-hermione knitting needles so that they flashed and clicked in midair beside [her]172-hermione , producing more hats and scarves .

[He]156-harry and [Ron]333-ron headed [downstairs]3009-downstairs from [[their]2419-they dormitory]2420-their dormitory together , discussing [Angelina]398-angelina ’s idea that [they]2419-they were to work on a new move called the Sloth Grip Roll during that night ’s Quidditch practice , and not until [they]2419-they were halfway across [the sunlit common room]2421-the sunlit common room did [they]2419-they notice the addition to [the room]707-the room that had already attracted the attention of [a small group of people]2423-a small group of people .

A large sign had been affixed to the Gryffindor notice board , so large that it covered everything else on there — the lists of secondhand spellbooks for sale , the regular reminders of school rules from [Argus Filch]130-argus filch , the [Quidditch team]2424-quidditch team training schedule , the offers to barter certain Chocolate Frog cards for [others]1348-others , the Weasleys ’ new advertisement for [testers]3325-testers , the dates of the Hogsmeade weekends , and the lost - and - found notices . The new sign was printed in large black letters and there was a highly official - looking seal at the bottom beside a neat and curly signature .

BY ORDER OF [The High Inquisitor of [Hogwarts]13-hogwarts]2427-the high inquisitor of hogwarts :

[All Student Organizations]2428-all student organizations , [Societies , Teams]2429-societies , teams , Groups , and [Clubs]2430-clubs are henceforth disbanded .

[An Organization , Society , Team , Group]2431-an organization , society , team , group , or Club is hereby defined as a regular meeting of [three or more students]2432-three or more students .

Permission to re - form may be sought from the High Inquisitor ( Professor Umbridge ) .

[No Student Organization]2433-no student organization , Society , Team , Group , or Club may exist without the knowledge and approval of [the High Inquisitor]2434-the high inquisitor .

[Any student found to have formed , or to belong to , an Organization , Society , Team]2435-any student found to have formed , or to belong to , an organization , society , team , Group , or Club that has not been approved by [the High Inquisitor]131-the high inquisitor will be expelled .

The above is in accordance with Educational Decree Number Twenty - four .

“ [I]247-ginny ’ll tell [Michael]476-michael corner , ”[247-ginny] said [Ginny]247-ginny impatiently , swinging [herself]247-ginny off [her]247-ginny bench . “ [The fool]4406-the fool , honestly ... ”[247-ginny]

[She]247-ginny hurried off toward the Ravenclaw table ; [Harry]156-harry watched [her]247-ginny go . “ [Harry]156-harry ! [Ron]333-ron ! ”[398-angelina]

“ [We]2496-their are continuing with [our]2496-their Strengthening Solutions today , [you]156-harry will find [your]156-harry mixtures as [you]156-harry left them last lesson , if correctly made [they]4430-they should have matured well over the weekend — instructions ”[156-harry] — [he]156-harry waved [his]156-harry wand again — “ on the board . [Professor Umbridge]390-professor umbridge spent the first half hour of the lesson making notes in [her]390-professor umbridge corner . [Harry]156-harry was very interested in hearing [her]390-professor umbridge question [Snape]249-snape , so interested , that [he]156-harry was becoming careless with [his]156-harry potion again .

“ Salamander blood , [Harry]156-harry ! ”[172-hermione] [Hermione]172-hermione moaned , grabbing [his]156-harry wrist to prevent [him]156-harry adding the wrong ingredient for the third time . “ Not pomegranate juice ! ”[172-hermione]

“ Right , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry vaguely , putting down the bottle and continuing to watch the corner . [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge had just gotten to [her]390-professor umbridge feet . “ Ha , ”[156-harry] [he]156-harry said softly , as [she]390-professor umbridge strode between two lines of desks toward [Snape]249-snape , who was bending over [Dean Thomas]392-dean ’s cauldron .

[Snape]249-snape straightened up slowly and turned to look at [her]390-professor umbridge .

First , [Fred]244-fred would take a bite out of the orange end of a chew , at which [he]244-fred would vomit spectacularly into a bucket [they]2515-they had placed in front of [them]2515-they . Then [he]244-fred would force down the purple end of the chew , at which the vomiting would immediately cease . [Lee Jordan]353-lee , who was assisting the demonstration , was lazily vanishing the vomit at regular intervals with the same Vanishing Spell [Snape]249-snape kept using on [Harry]156-harry ’s potions .

What with the regular sounds of retching , cheering , and [Fred]244-fred and [George]245-george taking advance orders from [the crowd]1241-the crowd , [Harry]156-harry was finding it exceptionally difficult to focus on the correct method for Strengthening Solutions . [Hermione]172-hermione was not helping matters ; the cheers and sound of vomit hitting the bottom of [Fred]244-fred and [George]245-george ’s bucket were punctuated by loud and disapproving sniffs that [Harry]156-harry found , if anything , more distracting .

“ [He]265-dung was banned from [the Hog ’s Head]129-the hog ’s head twenty years ago , ”[174-sirius] said [Sirius]174-sirius , “ and [that barman]4466-that barman ’s got a long memory . “ On duty doing what ? ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron quickly .

“ Never [you]333-ron mind , just stuff for the Order , ”[174-sirius] said [Sirius]174-sirius . “ So it ’s fallen to [me]174-sirius to be [the messenger]4471-the messenger and make sure [you]333-ron tell [her]3160-your mother [I]174-sirius passed it all on , because [I]174-sirius do n’t think [she]3160-your mother trusts [me]174-sirius to . ”[174-sirius]

There was another pause in which [Crookshanks]258-crookshanks , mewing , attempted to paw [Sirius]174-sirius ’s head , and [Ron]333-ron fiddled with a hole in the hearthrug .

“ So [you]333-ron want [me]333-ron to say [I]333-ron ’m not going to take part in the defense group ? ”[333-ron] [he]333-ron muttered finally .

“ [Me]174-sirius ? Certainly not ! ”[174-sirius] said [Sirius]174-sirius , looking surprised . “ [I]174-sirius think it ’s an excellent idea ! ”[174-sirius]

“ [You]174-sirius do ? ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry , [his]156-harry heart lifting .

Charms was always one of the best lessons in which to enjoy a private chat : There was generally so much movement and activity that the danger of being overheard was very slight . “ What happened ? ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron , the moment that [Alicia]434-alicia had disappeared through the door . “ Was it [your]333-ron scar ? ”[333-ron]

[Harry]156-harry nodded .

“ But ... ”[156-harry] Looking scared , [Ron]333-ron strode across to the window and stared out into the rain , “ [He]2568-a stranger — [he]2568-a stranger ca n’t be near [us]1841-the two of them now , can [he]2568-a stranger ? ”[333-ron]

“ No , ”[156-harry] [Harry]156-harry muttered , sinking onto a bench and rubbing [his]156-harry forehead . “ [He]2568-a stranger ’s probably miles away . It hurt because ... [he]2568-a stranger ’s ... angry . ”[156-harry]

[Harry]156-harry had not meant to say that at all , and heard the words as though [a stranger]2568-a stranger had spoken them — yet [he]156-harry knew at once that they were true . [He]156-harry did not know how [he]156-harry knew it , but [he]156-harry did ; [Voldemort]170-voldemort , wherever [he]170-voldemort was , whatever [he]170-voldemort was doing , was in a towering temper .

[Harry]156-harry sat quite still , staring at [his]156-harry feet , allowing [his]156-harry mind and [his]156-harry memory to relax in the aftermath of the pain ...

“ In [[her]437-mrs. norris office]1984-her office , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry , pointing . “ Okay , let ’s go . ”[156-harry]

[They]829-everybody argued all the way back to [the common room]1850-the common room , but [Harry]156-harry was not listening to [them]829-everybody . [Harry]156-harry felt as though [he]156-harry were carrying some kind of talisman inside [his]156-harry chest over the following two weeks , a glowing secret that supported [him]156-harry through [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge ’s classes and even made it possible for [him]156-harry to smile blandly as [he]156-harry looked into [her]359-cho horrible bulging eyes . [He]156-harry and [the D.A.]2666-the d.a. were resisting [her]359-cho under [her]359-cho very nose , doing the very thing that [she]359-cho and [the Ministry]15-the ministry most feared , and whenever [he]156-harry was supposed to be reading [Wilbert Slinkhard]331-wilbert slinkhard ’s book during [her]359-cho lessons [he]156-harry dwelled instead on satisfying memories of [their]2667-their most recent meetings , remembering how [Neville]342-neville had successfully disarmed [Hermione]172-hermione , how [Colin Creevey]497-colin creevey had mastered the Impediment Jinx after three meetings ’ hard effort , how [Parvati Patil]379-parvati had produced such a good Reductor Curse that [she]379-parvati had reduced the table carrying all the Sneakoscopes to dust .

[He]156-harry was finding it almost impossible to fix a regular night of the week for D.A. meetings , as [they]2668-they had to accommodate [three separate Quidditch teams]2669-three separate quidditch teams ’ practices , which were often rearranged depending on the weather conditions ; but [Harry]156-harry was not sorry about this , [he]156-harry had a feeling that it was probably better to keep the timing of [their]2667-their meetings unpredictable . If [anyone]2811-anyone was watching [them]2667-their , it would be hard to make out a pattern .

[Hermione]172-hermione soon devised a very clever method of communicating the time and date of the next meeting to [all the members]2671-all the members in case [they]2671-all the members needed to change it at short notice , because it would look so suspicious if [people from [different Houses]2673-different houses]2672-people from different houses were seen crossing [the Great Hall]1722-the great hall to talk to [each other]1037-each other too often . [She]172-hermione gave each of [the members of [the D.A.]146-the d.a.]2676-the members of the d.a. a fake Galleon ( [Ron]333-ron became very excited when [he]333-ron saw the basket at first , convinced that [she]172-hermione was actually giving out gold ) .

“ [You]333-ron see the numerals around the edge of the coins ? ”[172-hermione] [Hermione]172-hermione said , holding one up for examination at the end of [their]2667-their fourth meeting . The coin gleamed fat and yellow in the light from the torches . “ On real [Galleons]59-galleons that ’s just a serial number referring to [the goblin who cast the coin]4589-the goblin who cast the coin . On these fake coins , though , the numbers will change to reflect the time and date of the next meeting . The coins will grow hot when the date changes , so if [you]4590-you ’re carrying them in a pocket [you]4590-you ’ll be able to feel them . [We]2667-their take one each , and when [Harry]156-harry sets the date of the next meeting [he]156-harry ’ll change the numbers on [his]156-harry coin , and because [I]172-hermione ’ve put a Protean Charm on them , they ’ll all change to mimic [his]156-harry . ”[172-hermione]

A blank silence greeted [Hermione]172-hermione ’s words . [She]172-hermione looked around at all the faces upturned to [her]172-hermione , rather disconcerted .

“ Well — [I]172-hermione thought it was a good idea , ”[172-hermione] [she]172-hermione said uncertainly , “ [I]172-hermione mean , even if [Umbridge]390-professor umbridge asked [us]2667-their to turn out [our]2667-their pockets , there ’s nothing fishy about carrying a Galleon , is there ? But ... well , if [you]2677-he do n’t want to use them ... ”[172-hermione]

“ [You]477-terry boot can do a Protean Charm ? ”[477-terry boot] said [Terry Boot]477-terry boot .

“ Yes , ”[172-hermione] said [Hermione]172-hermione .

“ But that ’s ... that ’s N.E.W.T. standard , that is , ”[2677-he] [he]2677-he said weakly .

“ Oh , ”[172-hermione] said [Hermione]172-hermione , trying to look modest . “ Oh ... well ... yes , [I]172-hermione suppose it is ... ”[172-hermione]

“ How come [you]172-hermione ’re not in [Ravenclaw]94-ravenclaw ? ”[2677-he] [he]2677-he demanded , staring at [Hermione]172-hermione with something close to wonder . “ With brains like [yours]172-hermione ? ”[2677-he]

“ Well , [the Sorting Hat]383-the sorting hat did seriously consider putting [me]172-hermione in [Ravenclaw]94-ravenclaw during [my]172-hermione Sorting , ”[172-hermione] said [Hermione]172-hermione brightly , “ but it decided on [Gryffindor]329-gryffindor in the end . There was a murmur of assent and [everybody]829-everybody moved forward to collect one from the basket . [Harry]156-harry looked sideways at [Hermione]172-hermione .

“ [You]172-hermione know what these remind [me]156-harry of ? ”[156-harry]

“ No , what ’s that ? ”[2677-he]

“ [The Death Eaters]454-death eaters ’ scars . [Voldemort]170-voldemort touches one of them , and all [their]454-death eaters scars burn , and [they]454-death eaters know [they]454-death eaters ’ve got to join [him]170-voldemort . ”[156-harry]

“ Well ... yes , ”[172-hermione] said [Hermione]172-hermione quietly . “ That is where [I]172-hermione got the idea ... but [you]172-hermione ’ll notice [I]172-hermione decided to engrave the date on bits of metal rather than on [[our]4592-our members]4593-our members ’ skin ... ”[172-hermione]

“ Yeah ... [I]156-harry prefer [your]172-hermione way , ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry , grinning , as [he]156-harry slipped [his]156-harry Galleon into [his]156-harry pocket . “ [I]156-harry suppose the only danger with these is that [we]4592-our might accidentally spend them . ”[156-harry]

“ Fat chance , ”[333-ron] said [Ron]333-ron , who was examining [his]333-ron own fake Galleon with a slightly mournful air . “ [I]333-ron have n’t got any real Galleons to confuse it with . ”[333-ron]

As the first Quidditch match of the season , [Gryffindor]329-gryffindor versus [Slytherin]386-montague , drew nearer , [their]2679-their D.A. meetings were put on hold because [Angelina]398-angelina insisted on almost daily practices . The fact that the Quidditch Cup had not been held for so long added considerably to the interest and excitement surrounding the forthcoming game . [The Ravenclaws]396-the ravenclaws and [Hufflepuffs]498-hufflepuffs were taking a lively interest in the outcome , for [they]2679-their , of course , would be playing both teams over the coming year ; and [the Heads of House of [the competing teams]2681-the competing teams]2680-the heads of house of the competing teams , though [they]2680-the heads of house of the competing teams attempted to disguise it under a decent pretense of sportsmanship , were determined to see [their]2680-the heads of house of the competing teams side ’s victory . [Harry]156-harry realized how much [Professor McGonagall]306-professor mcgonagall cared about beating [Slytherin]386-montague when [she]306-professor mcgonagall abstained from giving [them]2679-their homework in the week leading up to the match .

“ [I]306-professor mcgonagall think [you]156-harry ’ve got enough to be getting on with at the moment , ”[306-professor mcgonagall] [she]306-professor mcgonagall said loftily . [Nobody]526-nobody could quite believe [their]2679-their ears until [she]306-professor mcgonagall looked directly at [Harry]156-harry and [Ron]333-ron and said grimly , “ [I]306-professor mcgonagall ’ve become accustomed to seeing the Quidditch Cup in [[my]306-professor mcgonagall study]4594-my study , [boys]3181-boys , and [I]306-professor mcgonagall really do n’t want to have to hand it over to [Professor Snape]249-snape , so use the extra time to practice , wo n’t [you]3181-boys ? ”[306-professor mcgonagall]

[Snape]249-snape was no less obviously partisan : [He]249-snape had booked the Quidditch pitch for [Slytherin]386-montague practice so often that [the Gryffindors]419-the gryffindors had difficulty getting on it to play . [He]249-snape was also turning a deaf ear to the many reports of [Slytherin]386-montague attempts to hex Gryffindor players in [the corridors]3813-the corridors . When [Alicia Spinnet]434-alicia turned up in [the hospital wing]3322-the hospital wing with [her]434-alicia eyebrows growing so thick and fast that they obscured [her]434-alicia vision and obstructed [her]434-alicia mouth , [Snape]249-snape insisted that [she]434-alicia must have attempted a Hair - Thickening Charm on [herself]434-alicia and refused to listen to [the fourteen eyewitnesses who insisted that [they]2685-the fourteen eyewitnesses who insisted that they had seen the slytherin keeper , miles bletchley , hit her from behind with a jinx while she worked in the library had seen [the Slytherin Keeper]2686-the slytherin keeper , [Miles Bletchley]499-bletchley , hit [her]434-alicia from behind with a jinx while [she]434-alicia worked in [the library]2032-the library]2685-the fourteen eyewitnesses who insisted that they had seen the slytherin keeper , miles bletchley , hit her from behind with a jinx while she worked in the library .

[Harry]156-harry felt optimistic about [Gryffindor]329-gryffindor ’s chances ; [they]2685-the fourteen eyewitnesses who insisted that they had seen the slytherin keeper , miles bletchley , hit her from behind with a jinx while she worked in the library had , after all , never lost to [[Malfoy]298-malfoy ’s team]2688-malfoy ’s team . Admittedly [Ron]333-ron was still not performing to [Wood]399-oliver wood ’s standard , but [he]333-ron was working extremely hard to improve . [His]333-ron greatest weakness was a tendency to lose confidence when [he]333-ron made a blunder ; if [he]333-ron let in one goal [he]333-ron became flustered and was therefore likely to miss more . On the other hand , [Harry]156-harry had seen [Ron]333-ron make some truly spectacular saves when [he]333-ron was on form : During one memorable practice , [he]333-ron had hung one - handed from [his]333-ron broom and kicked the Quaffle so hard away from the goal hoop that it soared the length of the pitch and through the center hoop at the other end . [The rest of [the team]3945-the team]2566-the rest of the team felt this save compared favorably with one made recently by [Barry Ryan]500-barry ryan , [the Irish International Keeper]2691-the irish international keeper , against [[Poland]149-poland ’s top Chaser]2692-poland ’s top chaser , [Ladislaw Zamojski]501-ladislaw zamojski . [Even Fred]244-fred had said that [Ron]333-ron might yet make [him]244-fred and [George]245-george proud , and that [they]2693-they were seriously considering admitting that [he]333-ron was related to [them]2693-they , something [he]244-fred assured [Ron]333-ron [they]2693-they had been trying to deny for four years .

The only thing really worrying [Harry]156-harry was how much [Ron]333-ron was allowing the tactics of [the Slytherin team]2192-the slytherin team to upset [him]156-harry before [they]2693-they even got onto the pitch . [Harry]156-harry , of course , had endured [their]2693-they snide comments for more than four years , so whispers of , “ Hey , [Potty]414-potty wee potter , [I]2693-they heard [Warrington]502-warrington ’s sworn to knock [you]414-potty wee potter off [your]414-potty wee potter broom on Saturday , ”[2693-they] far from chilling [his]156-harry blood , made [him]156-harry laugh . “ [Warrington]502-warrington ’s aim ’s so pathetic [I]333-ron ’d be more worried if [he]502-warrington was aiming for [the person next to [me]333-ron]4596-the person next to me , ”[333-ron] [he]333-ron retorted , which made [Ron]333-ron and [Hermione]172-hermione laugh and wiped the smirk off [Pansy Parkinson]362-pansy parkinson ’s face .

But [Ron]333-ron had never endured a relentless campaign of insults , jeers , and intimidation . When [Slytherins]395-the slytherins , some of [them]2693-they seventh years and considerably larger than [he]333-ron was , muttered as [they]2695-they passed in [the corridors]3813-the corridors , “ Got [your]333-ron bed booked in [the hospital wing]3322-the hospital wing , [Weasley]333-ron ? ”[333-ron] [he]333-ron did not laugh , but turned a delicate shade of green . When [Draco Malfoy]298-malfoy imitated [Ron]333-ron dropping the Quaffle ( which [he]298-malfoy did whenever [they]2695-they were within sight of [each other]1037-each other ) , [Ron]333-ron ’s ears glowed red and [his]333-ron hands shook so badly that [he]333-ron was likely to drop whatever [he]333-ron was holding at the time too .

October extinguished itself in a rush of howling winds and driving rain and November arrived , cold as frozen iron , with hard frosts every morning and icy drafts that bit at exposed hands and faces . The skies and the ceiling of [the Great Hall]1722-the great hall turned a pale , pearly gray , [the mountains around [Hogwarts]13-hogwarts]2699-the mountains around hogwarts became snowcapped , and the temperature in [the castle]1683-the castle dropped so far that [many students]2701-many students wore [their]2701-many students thick protective dragon skin gloves in [the corridors]3813-the corridors between lessons .

The morning of the match dawned bright and cold . When [Harry]156-harry awoke [he]156-harry looked around at [[Ron]333-ron ’s bed]2703-ron ’s bed and saw [him]333-ron sitting bolt upright , [his]333-ron arms around [his]333-ron knees , staring fixedly into space .

“ [You]333-ron all right ? ”[156-harry] said [Harry]156-harry .

[Ron]333-ron nodded but did not speak . [Harry]156-harry was reminded forcibly of the time that [Ron]333-ron had accidentally put a slug - vomiting charm on [himself]333-ron . [He]333-ron looked just as pale and sweaty as [he]333-ron had done then , not to mention as reluctant to open [his]333-ron mouth .

“ [You]333-ron just need some breakfast , ”[156-harry] [Harry]156-harry said bracingly . “ C’m on . ”[156-harry]

[The Great Hall]96-the great hall was filling up fast when [they]2704-they arrived , the talk louder and the mood more exuberant than usual . [They]2704-they received a rousing welcome at the Gryffindor table , where [everyone]779-everyone was wearing red and gold , but far from raising [Ron]333-ron ’s spirits the cheers seemed to sap the last of [his]333-ron morale ; [he]333-ron collapsed onto the nearest bench looking as though [he]333-ron were facing [his]333-ron final meal .

“ [I]333-ron must ’ve been mental to do this , ”[333-ron] [he]333-ron said in a croaky whisper . “ Mental . ”[333-ron]

“ [I]333-ron ’m rubbish , ”[333-ron] croaked [Ron]333-ron . “ [I]333-ron ’m lousy . [I]333-ron ca n’t play to save [my]333-ron life . What was [I]333-ron thinking ? ”[333-ron]

[Hermione]172-hermione and [Ginny]247-ginny sat down opposite [them]2708-them wearing red - and - gold scarves , gloves , and rosettes .

[Angelina]398-angelina had changed already and was talking to [the rest of [the team]3945-the team]2566-the rest of the team when [they]2712-they entered . “ And it ’s [Johnson]398-angelina , [Johnson]398-angelina with the Quaffle , what [a player that girl]4604-a player that girl is , [I]298-malfoy ’ve been saying it for years but [she]398-angelina still wo n’t go out with [me]298-malfoy — ”[298-malfoy]

“ [JORDAN]353-lee ! ”[306-professor mcgonagall] yelled [Professor McGonagall]306-professor mcgonagall .

[Lee Jordan]353-lee ’s commentary rang through [the stadium]2186-the stadium and [Harry]156-harry listened as hard as [he]156-harry could through the wind whistling in [his]156-harry ears and the din of [the crowd]1241-the crowd , all yelling and booing and singing —

“ — dodges [Warrington]502-warrington , avoids a Bludger — close call , [Alicia]434-alicia — and [the crowd]1241-the crowd are loving this , just listen to [them]1241-the crowd , what ’s that [they]1241-the crowd ’re singing ? ”[1241-the crowd]

And as [Lee]353-lee paused to listen the song rose loud and clear from the sea of green and silver in [the Slytherin section of [the stands]2736-the stands]2735-the slytherin section of the stands .

“ — and [Alicia]434-alicia passes back to [Angelina]398-angelina ! ”[353-lee] [Lee]353-lee shouted , and as [Harry]156-harry swerved , [his]156-harry insides boiling at what [he]156-harry had just heard , [he]156-harry knew [Lee]353-lee was trying to drown out the sound of the singing . “ Come on now , [Angelina]398-angelina — looks like [she]398-angelina ’s got [just the Keeper to beat]4607-just the keeper to beat ! — [SHE]434-alicia SHOOTS — [SHE]434-alicia — aaaah ... ”[353-lee]

[Bletchley]499-bletchley , [the Slytherin Keeper]2686-the slytherin keeper , had saved the goal ; [he]2686-the slytherin keeper threw the Quaffle to [Warrington]502-warrington who sped off with [it]2738-it , zigzagging in between [Alicia]434-alicia and [Katie]385-katie ; the singing from below grew louder and louder as [he]353-lee drew nearer and nearer [Ron]333-ron .

[Harry]156-harry could not help [himself]156-harry : Abandoning [his]156-harry search for [the Snitch]2194-the snitch , [he]156-harry turned [his]156-harry Firebolt toward [Ron]333-ron , [a lone figure at the far end of the pitch , hovering before the three goal hoops]2740-a lone figure at the far end of the pitch , hovering before the three goal hoops while [the massive Warrington]502-warrington pelted toward [him]156-harry ...

A great swell of song rose from the Slytherin stands below .

“ — so it ’s the first test for new [Gryffindor Keeper]425-gryffindor , [Weasley]333-ron , [brother of [Beaters]507-beaters]4609-brother of beaters , [Fred]244-fred and [George]245-george , and [a promising new talent on [the team]3945-the team]4610-a promising new talent on the team — come on , [Ron]333-ron ! ”[353-lee]

But the scream of delight came from the Slytherin end : [Ron]333-ron had dived wildly , [his]333-ron arms wide , and the Quaffle had soared between [them]2741-them , straight through [Ron]333-ron ’s central hoop .

[The Slytherins]395-the slytherins sang even louder .

“ [Harry]156-harry , WHAT ARE [YOU]156-harry DOING ? ”[398-angelina] screamed [Angelina]398-angelina , soaring past [him]2743-him to keep up with [Katie]385-katie . “ GET GOING ! ”[398-angelina]

[He]156-harry dived ...

It was over in two breathless , desperate , windswept seconds — [Harry]156-harry ’s fingers closed around the tiny , struggling ball — [Malfoy]298-malfoy ’s fingernails scrabbled the back of [Harry]156-harry ’s hand hopelessly — [Harry]156-harry pulled [his]156-harry broom upward , holding the struggling ball in [his]156-harry hand and [the Gryffindor spectators]2767-the gryffindor spectators screamed [their]2767-the gryffindor spectators approval ...

“ Banned , ”[398-angelina] said [Angelina]398-angelina in a hollow voice , late that evening in [the common room]1850-the common room . “ Banned . [No Seeker]4656-no seeker and [no Beaters]4163-no beaters ... What on earth are [we]2793-we going to do ? ”[398-angelina]

[Harry]156-harry stared miserably at the dark window . Snow was falling . [He]333-ron was very pale indeed and there was snow in [his]333-ron hair . When [he]333-ron saw [Harry]156-harry and [Hermione]172-hermione [he]333-ron stopped dead in [his]333-ron tracks .
